story:
Breve Sommario

Cagliostro E-Press è un'associazione culturale che ah come scopo principale quello di scoprire e avviare alla professione del fumettista nuovi talenti, una "bottega editoriale", dove un gruppo di appassionati di fumetto con alle spalle tanti anni di esperienza, sforna progetti collettivi per far debuttare le nuove leve del fumetto italiano e internazionale. Paolo Zeccardo è uno di questi: ha debuttato con noi nel 2007 con la miniserie Gravetowne  oggi è un autore professionista con varie pubblicazioni all'attivo e un'insegnante delle Scuola Internazionale di Comics sede di Roma.

  • La campagna che stiamo lanciando ci permetterà di ridare alle stampe la sua opera di debutto, esaurita da anni  e tutt'ora ricercata. Allo stesso tempo permetterà a Cagliostro di finanziare nuovi progetti e nuove attività volti a scoprire e valorizzare altri giovani talenti come Paolo.
  • Questo sostanzialmente è quello che ci aiuterete a realizzare: una nuova stupenda edizione, apmpliata e corretta, di Gravetown, in un unico volume omnibus di 360 pagine (formato 17x24 cm), riconoscere ulteriori benefici economici a Paolo e raccogliere altre risorse per finanziare nuovi progetti.

 

Cosa ci serve e cosa avrete in cambio

qualche dettaglio:

  • L'obiettivo è raccogliere 2000 euro che saranno così ripartiti: 500 euro circa per la stampa  del volume in questione; 500 euro di riconoscimento economico per l'autore; 1000 euro per le spese di spedizione, redazione, attività promozionali, ecc...
  • Quello che vi offriamo sono: la nostra gratitudine per condividere e sostenere l'iniziativa; il volume contenente l'intera miniserie, il capitolo aggiuntivo e extra vari; la possibilità di avere la copia del volume con un disegno originale di Paolo; la copia del volume con un'illustrazione a colori e per finire, una copia del volume con una tavola originale a scelta tra le 5 (si, solo 5 potranno averla) messe a disposizione da Paolo
  • La campagna sarà di tipo flessibile, perciò produrremo quanto necessario per soddisfare le richieste dei sostenitori.

 

A questo punto non ci resta che invitarvi a sostenere la nostra iniziativa, condividendola sui social media che frequentate, sui form, blog, al bar e con gli amici: solo così potremo raggiungere il nostro obiettivo, modesto in termini assoluti ma, grande per noi e per tutte quelle persone che potremo seguire e avviare alla professione di fumettista!

Breve Sommario
Cagliostro E-Press è un'associazione culturale che ah come scopo principale quello di scoprire e avviare alla professione del fumettista nuovi talenti, una "bottega editoriale", dove un gruppo di appassionati di fumetto con alle spalle tanti anni di esperienza, sforna progetti collettivi per far debuttare le nuove leve del fumetto italiano e internazionale. La campagna che stiamo lanciando ci permetterà di ridare alle stampe la sua opera di debutto, esaurita da anni  e tutt'ora ricercata. Allo stesso tempo permetterà a Cagliostro di finanziare nuovi progetti e nuove attività volti a scoprire e valorizzare altri giovani talenti come Paolo.
Questo sostanzialmente è quello che ci aiuterete a realizzare: una nuova stupenda edizione, apmpliata e corretta, di Gravetown, in un unico volume omnibus di 360 pagine (formato 17x24 cm), riconoscere ulteriori benefici economici a Paolo e raccogliere altre risorse per finanziare nuovi progetti.

 

Cosa ci serve e cosa avrete in cambio
qualche dettaglio:

L'obiettivo è raccogliere 2000 euro che saranno così ripartiti: 500 euro circa per la stampa  del volume in questione; 500 euro di riconoscimento economico per l'autore; 1000 euro per le spese di spedizione, redazione, attività promozionali, ecc...
Quello che vi offriamo sono: la nostra gratitudine per condividere e sostenere l'iniziativa; il volume contenente l'intera miniserie, il capitolo aggiuntivo e extra vari; la possibilità di avere la copia del volume con un disegno originale di Paolo; la copia del volume con un'illustrazione a colori e per finire, una copia del volume con una tavola originale a scelta tra le 5 (si, solo 5 potranno averla) messe a disposizione da Paolo
La campagna sarà di tipo flessibile, perciò produrremo quanto necessario per soddisfare le richieste dei sostenitori.

 
A questo punto non ci resta che invitarvi a sostenere la nostra iniziativa, condividendola sui social media che frequentate, sui form, blog, al bar e con gli amici: solo così potremo raggiungere il nostro obiettivo, modesto in termini assoluti ma, grande per noi e per tutte quelle persone che potremo seguire e avviare alla professione di fumettista!

story:
The K stands for KARMA!

From the writer of THE ABDUCTABLES and the artist of THE BALLAD OF DUSTY TORTILLAS comes a new breed of superhero!

GRAYSKALE: WELCOME TO GLITTER CITY is a 60 page full color graphic novel about a trash-talking vigilante with the power to control the forces of karma!

WRITER: Michael Derrick (THE ABDUCTABLES)

ARTIST: P.K. Santra (THE BALLAD OF DUSTY TORTILLAS)

COLORIST: Eugeniu Betivu (HIRO: BLOOD OF PATRIOTS)

LETTERER: Jaymes Reed (CROSSED)

PRODUCTION DESIGN: George Peter Gatsis (JOE KING) 

LOGO: Brandon Diaz (MAGIC COP)  

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: You?! (see perk)

What You Get!

Not only will you receive a SIGNED, BAGGED, and BOARDED copy of the 60 page comic book (and possibly more, depending on which perk you choose) but you'll ALSO get your name or username listed in the SPECIAL THANKS section of the book, as well as any STRETCH GOALS unlocked during the campaign! 

Pinup of the Karmic Crusader GRAYSKALE versus the Grim Gargantuan REAPO by CASH GRAB artist Donal DeLay!

STRETCH GOALS!

ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS will receive these additional items FOR FREE should we meet the required thresholds!

  • UNLOCKED! - TRADING CARD SET! Two oversized crossover trading cards featuring The Karmic Crusader Grayskale versus The World's Greatest Average Hero Joe King! Art by George Peter Gatsis (https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/joe-king-saving-everyone-again-for-the-first-time/coming_soon/x/18709572)

  • UNLOCKED! - MAGNET! Decorate your car or fridge with  a custom die-cut magnet of The Karmic Crusader (in chibi form!) with art by STAR FETCHED artist Mark Marianelli!

  • UNLOCKED! - PHANTASMAGORIA Pinup by CYBORG USA artist Pablo Romero! An original print pinup featuring exclusive artwork of the Psychedelic Psychopath (she's the trippy babe featured on the cover art and in the Get Drawn Into the Book perk) will be included with ALL physical orders! 

  • $15,000 - "Welcome to Glitter City" Travel Brochure! Take a tour through Glitter City and see the sights that our hero's hometown has to offer! Explore the City Where Anything Goes with this custom-made print brochure featuring exclusive artwork and descriptions of all of The Gutter's most famous (and infamous) landmarks!
  • $20,000 - Squarebound! The printing of GRAYSKALE will be upgraded from a standard comic book to a full-blown TRADE PAPERBACK!

DARK AGES ASHCAN

It's 5720 AD. Earth is destroyed and humans are scattered out in the solar system. Mars is a human colony with deep dark secrets...

If you're familiar with my previous Indiegogo campaign THE ABDUCTABLES, you'll know that I delivered that book ON TIME and to much critical acclaim! Now, having been through the printing and shipping process once before, I'm ready to take what I've learned to deliver an even BIGGER and BETTER product!

Pinup by ABDUCTABLES artist Ibai Canales!

Pinup by FOREIGN AGENT artist Narwhal!

Other Ways You Can Help (And Get Good Karma!)

Please help spread the word by telling your friends and family about the project!

The great thing about crowdfunding is that, unlike just buying a book off the stands, you the backer get to play a fundamental role in the creation of the book itself! Because without you, none of this would be possible.

Remember, this book is YOURS just as much as it is mine!

story:
Old Good Times è un'antologia sul tema dei ricordi più belli e sulla nostalgia, divisa tra fumetti e illustrazioni.

Abbiamo costruito questa piccola macchina del tempo sperando che riuscirai a tornare con noi a quei bei "vecchi tempi" che a pensarci ti torna il sorriso e un pizzico di malinconia.

Old Good Times è un libro che raccoglie storie a fumetti e illustrazioni di 20 artisti italiani +2 guest star staniere, composto da più di 100 pagine a colori rilegate in brossura. 

Il volume prende il testimone dalla nostra prima opera "Ghost Stories" nell'esplorazione di un nuovo sentimento che ha ispirato la creazione di belle storie e illustrazioni suggestive.

Formula Magica è un progetto nato nel 2017 con l'obiettivo di creare belle storie. Questa è la nostra seconda antologia e anche questa volta ci siamo circondati da artisti bravissimi per farci regalare la loro visione del tema, appunto, la nostalgia. 
Oltre ai due fondatori Alessandro Pecin e Andrea Sodaro in questo volume troverete storie e illustrazioni di:

Paola Zanghì, Valeria Viero, Rosalia Raro Radosti, Paola Oliviero, Angelo Pintore, Giuseppe Balestra, Francesco Corigliano, Alessandro Bucca, Marta Bertello, Lucia Di Giammarino, Mateen Matt Razzak, Giada Carboni, Viola Massarenti, Jessica Lunar, Fabs Nocera, Assia Ieradi Se, Silvia Landucci, Martina Matroieni, Frane, Caomor.

Il tema di Old Good Times ci ha permesso di sbizzarirci parecchio nella creazione di perks a supporto della nostra campagna, dai un'occhiata, siamo sicuri che c'è qualcosa di cui non puoi proprio fare a meno!

Abbiamo pensato a vari Stretch Goals per "Old Good Times" quasi tutti rivolti a rendere il più prezioso possibile questo volume a cui teniamo molto, ma NON SOLO! Vi sveliamo il primo per ora!

 

I fondi per questa campagna saranno divisi in questo modo:

  • 35% saranno le spese di stampa del volume.
  • 30% serviranno per le spese di spedizione.
  • 20% copriranno la realizzazione dei perks.
  • 15% finiranno nelle tasse di indiegogo.

Quella di Old Good Times sarà la nostra seconda campagna crowdfounding che affronteremo con maggiore consapevolezza della prima in cui ci siamo buttati in questo mondo.

Siamo consci di tutto lo sforzo che serve soprattutto post campagna e siamo pronti a portare tra le tue mani un nuovo prodotto di qualità anche superiore del precedente! 

Sappiamo bene che non tutti sono in grado di supportare una causa economicamente, ma sei comunque interessati a darci una mano in qualche modo? È facile!

Un'ottimo strumento a tua disposizione è il passaparola: parlarne con amici e conoscenti fa già tantissimo.
Condividi, inoltre, la campagna sui tuoi social, queste piccole azioni contribuiranno a far arrivare la voce di questo progetto a più persone possibili e ci aiuteranno a renderlo realtà!

Se vuoi seguirci ecco dove puoi trovare formula magica:

Facebook

Instagram 

Twitter

Sito

Grazie a tutti!!

story:
Physical Print Edition Cover

 

Digital Edition Cover

 

Update!

Right, we're lagging behind a bit with how much time is left, so as an extra measure, we're adding an EXTRA comic to the mix! When we hit 50% we will add Life On Cora: Atzi and the Ritual to the mix for every physical copy tier!

That's right! A FREE extra comic!

 

 

Can't back but still want to help out?

A tweet or facebook post can go a long way! If you like what you're seeing here, just share the link and it'll help us out immensely!

You did back? Awesome, thank you so much! It would mean the world if you went and share it with the world too!

We'll make it easy for you, even, just copy paste:

  • I just backed #ProjectMARC, go check it out on @indiegogo! https://igg.me/at/PROJECTMARC/x/23366240#/ #crowdfunding #support #comics #fairytale
  • Go and check out #ProjectMARC on @indiegogo! You new favorite fairytale without the fairies! https://igg.me/at/PROJECTMARC/x/23366240#/ #crowdfunding #support #comics

 

Risks and Challenges:

Faeries & Ents has experience in handling the risks and challenges that come with an endeavor such as this, learned from our previous successful projects. We have ensured that the art has been completed and the comic ready to print.

We have set strict deadlines and optimized our work pipeline to make sure that printing goes smoothly, and that all orders of the physical print will be shipped on May 20th, 2020.

We also know that things can happen on their way to your home, which is why we will make sure that each order will be carefully wrapped to ensure that the risk of damaged goods is minimized.

story:
Si vous ne pouvez pas lire l'anglais cliquez ici!

Para Espanol, cliqua aqui!

NEW MERCH AVAILABLE

For the last days of the campaign we have added fresh new and original merchandise!

 

The Golden Beard Project :

We're a multicultural team of creators (illustrators, writers, and musicians) who have been working on the Golden Beard project for years. Over thirty individuals have contributed their talents to Golden Beard!

Our next adventure is the creation of three 24-page comic books. We are asking for your help in covering the costs of illustration and printing the books in time for Halloween this year. The book is a home-grown labour of love, created in Montreal with collaboration between creators from around the world.

Golden Beard is a story we have been working on for years and that we feel has to be told with drawings and music. It is a kick ass pirate story that has something profound, rich and worthy of your attention. We also want to build soundtracks for every comic book that gets out there, to enhance the reading experience.

Our first instrumental album is available for FREE. HERE

Check out some completed art HERE

From the bottom of our scurvy hearts, we thank you for your support! Will Golden Beard be able to escape his fate and trick Death into letting him live again? He just might... but he will need your help!"

Tons of cool Rewards !

We value your contributions. So we created many bundles of rewards so you can get your money worth of goodies. We want this to be an investment for you folks! To get to really understand ... Here's a Resume!

On Board! Click HERE for HD image!

 Ship Mate! Click HERE for HD image!

 Brothers of War! Click HERE for HD image!

 Patron! Click HERE for HD image!

* Note you can add to any reward 35$ for a special Tank Top, 20$ for a leather tie and 10$ for a bandana. Simply specify your intention in your order.

The Story

Waiting for death to watch the movie of his life, Golden Beard, a famous pirate, bypasses the queue leading to the final judgment. He requests to be immediately redirected to earth; his sailors are caught in a brawl and he must save them, as well as his honor. Death, who is a joyful little girl spending the most of her time playing and trying to escape the exercise of her functions, notices the pirate and takes him into her spooky gardens to drink tea with other famous historical characters such as Hitler, Ghandi and Napoleon. She will play with him like a toy, which will bring the pirate to criticize her existence. This highlights the truths of the meaningless life she leads and destabilizes her profoundly. Death then accepts to make the captain discover the intricacies of her mysterious and dark world, while continuing to play with him like a toy.

She will then offer the captain a deal: restoring his life and giving him a well-stocked ship in exchange of stories of his adventures written in a book as well as the promise to retrace her origins. Death then warns him; stories must be exquisite because what pushes punishment only waits for deeper punishment!

Main Themes

Golden Beard is a suspense, action and gore comic-book filled with dark humor that explores different themes as : animality vs humanity, anarchism vs capitalism, time and money slipping, revolution, fair sharing, environnement,

Its the story of Death not knowing where she comes from, even though she watches everybody's movie of life with them after death. It is the story of Death and life being twin sisters that hate each other.

It is the story of gods being bankers of time in a recession. A story that brings us all to question ourselves on our origins through death trying to humanize itself. Ironicaly, it is the story of a pirate Captain being prisoner in his will for complete freedom.

Over-Shoot Objectives

If we get pas our goal of 6666$, we want to show you our commitment by focusing on further objectives to push the project further. We will also reward our contributors with free extra stuff.

For HD image Click HERE

Open Source Mentality

We cannot do a pirate project without passing by the contemporary form of individual piracy. We truly believe in the open source mentality and want to create an exchange around our stories.

As an example, the soundtrack and our artwork are not only free but OPEN SOURCE. HELL YEAH!

So use it. Pirate it. Remix It. Colour it. Photoshop it. If you want High Quality Artwork or Music tracks, write us at contribute@goldenbeardproject.com. Actually, our work is under a creative commons liscence.

Our overshoot objectives are to create more comic book episodes, more artwork, a full length soundtrack and to create a platform of collaboration.

Help us Spread the Word!

Please take a moment to share The Golden Beard Project with your friends on Facebook and Twitter by sharing our link or following us on the platforms. By sharing it, you're helping us to educate the public about the project and helping us to get one step closer to our quest of "Pirate world domination"!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The present risks our team face is mainly torwards deadlines since we all have main jobs to assure our living. By financing this project, you help us to get focused on this project for 3 months.

Another inhérent risk is food poison since we all will work together in David’s kitchen and that his culinary experiments sometimes are as spécial as his mind!

FAQ

Will the comic book be in full colour ? Only if we reach the 6 666$ funding !

What if you dont get fully funded ? We will produce 1 comic book @ 2222$ and 2 comic books @ 4444 $. In black and white.

What if I only want 1 comic book and the full soundtrack ? You will be able to buy individual soundtracks from our Bandcamp.

Where would I be able to buy the extra comics ? The comics should be available on a web plateform to buy from. If not, we will use our Bandcamp plateform to sell goddies and issues temporarly.

 

 

Speak White ! En Français SVP!

Avant toute chose, sachez que Golden Beard (Barbe Or) est présentement lancé en Anglais afin de rejoindre un bassin d’auditeurs plus large. Basé à Montréal, notre équipe est majoritairement francophone et nous pouvons vous assurer que tous les produits qui découleront de notre production seront disponibles en Français.

Le Projet Golden Beard :

Nous sommes une fabuleuse équipe multiculturelle de créateurs qui travaillent sur ce projet depuis plusieurs années. Puisque notre projet est une histoire de collaboration, sachez que près de 35 individus ont contribué dans ces divers produits dérivés.

La première trame sonore est disponible GRATUITEMENT. CLIQUEZ ICI

Afin de regarder certains de nos dessins de production CLIQUEZ ICI

Notre prochain projet est de faire 3 BD de 24p colorées et nous visons les sortir avant Halloween 2013! Nous souhaitons aussi faire des trames sonores uniques pour chaque BD qui va sortir afin d’enrichir l’expérience de lecture.

C’est pour ça qu’on a besoin de vous! La campagne IndieGogo nous sert à amasser des fonds afin de couvrir les coûts d’illustration, de couleur et d’impression. Ces fonds vont aussi nous permettre de signer un contrat de distribution avec un distributeur majeur. Le projet sera basé à Montréal avec des collaborateurs venant des 4 coins du globe.

Golden Beard (Barbe Or) est une histoire sur laquelle nous travaillons depuis plusieurs années qui mérite d’être racontée avec des dessins et de la musique. C’est une histoire « à vous botter le cul » qui a quelque chose de profond, de riche et qui mérite votre précieuse attention.

L’Histoire

En attendant que la mort regarde le film de sa vie, Barbe Or, un pirate de renom, court-circuite la file menant au jugement dernier. Il demande d’être réexpédié sur terre car ses marins sont pris dans une escarmouche et il doit les sauver ainsi que son honneur. La mort, une jolie petite fille passant la majorité de son temps à échapper à l’exercice de ses fonctions, prends d’affection le pirate et l’invite à entrer dans son univers fantasmagorique. Elle jouera avec l’ours en peluche dans son salon de thé avec des personnages historiques connus : Hitler, Gandhi, Napoléon etc. Au fil du temps, le Pirate réussiras à toucher les cordes sensibles de la mort; mettant le doigt sur l’incapacité de celle-ci à connaitre ses origines. Profondément troublée, la mort décidera d’offrir au capitaine un pacte : elle lui redonneras la vie, ainsi qu’un bateau bien garni, en échange de sa promesse de lui livrer ses aventures en écrits ainsi que la mission de retracer ses origines. Elle le mettra toutefois en garde, ses histoires devront être bonnes car « à châtiment repoussé n’attends que châtiment plus grand»! 

Contribution

Afin de contribuer au projet, vous avez différent choix de « paquet ».

Le concept est simple : Plus vous donnez, plus vous allez recevoir de produits et certains de ceux-ci seront soit exclusifs ou très rares.

Afin de visionner un résumé de nos prix CLIQUEZ ICI

De plus, nous avons divisé nos prix en 4 catégories. Cliquez sur le titre de chacune d’elles pour vous montrer un aperçu des prix que nous offrons.

Catégorie 1 : On Board

Catégorie 2 : Ship Mate

Catégorie 3 : Brothers Of War

Catégorie 4 : Patron

Au delà de notre objectif de 6666$

Avec cette campagne de socio-financement, il est possible que nous recevions des sommes supplémentaires et que nous dépassions notre objectif initial.

Afin de vous montrer que nous croyons vraiment au projet et pour vous motiver à en parler autour de vous, nous nous sommes fixés des objectifs supplémentaires.

Afin de voir le résumé, veuillez CLIQUER ICI

Aidez nous à Répandre la Nouvelle

S’il vous plait, prenez le temps de partagerThe Golden Beard Project avec vos amis sur Facebook et Twitter! Cela va nous aider grandement à faire connaitre le projet au grand public dans notre utlime quête de “Conquérir le MONDE”!

QFP – questions fréquemment posées

Est-ce que la Bd va être en couleur ? Seulement si nous atteignons notre financement de 6 666$ !

Que faites vous si vous n’atteignez pas votre objectif ? Nous produirons 1 Bd @ 2222$ et 2 BD @ 4444 $. En noir et blanc.

Que faire si je veux UNE Bd et les Chansons ? Vous allez pouvoir, en temps et lieu, acheter les trames sonores sur Bandcamp.

Où pourrais-je acheter les BD supplémentaires ? Celles-ci seront disponibles sur notre plateforme web. Lorsque nous aurons les sous pour la mettre en place. Sinon, nous utiliserons notre Bandcamp afin de vendre nos copies virtuelles et physiques.

 

EN ESPANOL

Somos un equipo multicultural de ilustradores, escritores y músicos hemos estado trabajando en el proyecto Barba de Oro (Golden Beard Project) por muchos años. En el han contribuido más de treinta personas con su talento, experiencia y motivacion para hacer de Golden Beard Project un gran experiencia!

Nuestra próxima aventura es la creación de tres libros de historietas de 24 páginas, que cuentan historias de la muerte, una niña, de como regresa el capitán pirata Barba de Oro de entre los muertos para luchar contra numerosos enemigos para su placer retorcido.

Estamos pidiendo su ayuda para cubrir los costos de ilustración e impresión de las historietas a tiempo, las cuales se entregaran en Halloween de este año. Tu donacion podra realizarse en http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/golden-beard donde tambien concoeras las recompesas por cada una de ellas.

Golden Beard Proyect valora sus contribuciones. Así que hemos creado muchos paquetes de premios para que pueda obtener su dinero una retribución. Queremos que esto sea una inversión para ustedes amigos!
story_txt:
Si vous ne pouvez pas lire l'anglais cliquez ici!
Para Espanol, cliqua aqui!

NEW MERCH AVAILABLE
For the last days of the campaign we have added fresh new and original merchandise!

 
The Golden Beard Project : 
We're a multicultural team of creators (illustrators, writers, and musicians) who have been working on the Golden Beard project for years. Over thirty individuals have contributed their talents to Golden Beard!
Our next adventure is the creation of three 24-page comic books. We are asking for your help in covering the costs of illustration and printing the books in time for Halloween this year. The book is a home-grown labour of love, created in Montreal with collaboration between creators from around the world.
Golden Beard is a story we have been working on for years and that we feel has to be told with drawings and music. It is a kick ass pirate story that has something profound, rich and worthy of your attention. We also want to build soundtracks for every comic book that gets out there, to enhance the reading experience.
Our first instrumental album is available for FREE. HERE
Check out some completed art HERE
From the bottom of our scurvy hearts, we thank you for your support! Will Golden Beard be able to escape his fate and trick Death into letting him live again? He just might... but he will need your help!"
Tons of cool Rewards !
We value your contributions. So we created many bundles of rewards so you can get your money worth of goodies. We want this to be an investment for you folks! To get to really understand ... Here's a Resume!
On Board! Click HERE for HD image!

 Ship Mate! Click HERE for HD image!

 Brothers of War! Click HERE for HD image!

 Patron! Click HERE for HD image!

* Note you can add to any reward 35$ for a special Tank Top, 20$ for a leather tie and 10$ for a bandana. Simply specify your intention in your order.

The Story
Waiting for death to watch the movie of his life, Golden Beard, a famous pirate, bypasses the queue leading to the final judgment. He requests to be immediately redirected to earth; his sailors are caught in a brawl and he must save them, as well as his honor. Death, who is a joyful little girl spending the most of her time playing and trying to escape the exercise of her functions, notices the pirate and takes him into her spooky gardens to drink tea with other famous historical characters such as Hitler, Ghandi and Napoleon. She will play with him like a toy, which will bring the pirate to criticize her existence. This highlights the truths of the meaningless life she leads and destabilizes her profoundly. Death then accepts to make the captain discover the intricacies of her mysterious and dark world, while continuing to play with him like a toy.
She will then offer the captain a deal: restoring his life and giving him a well-stocked ship in exchange of stories of his adventures written in a book as well as the promise to retrace her origins. Death then warns him; stories must be exquisite because what pushes punishment only waits for deeper punishment!

Main Themes
Golden Beard is a suspense, action and gore comic-book filled with dark humor that explores different themes as : animality vs humanity, anarchism vs capitalism, time and money slipping, revolution, fair sharing, environnement,
Its the story of Death not knowing where she comes from, even though she watches everybody's movie of life with them after death. It is the story of Death and life being twin sisters that hate each other.
It is the story of gods being bankers of time in a recession. A story that brings us all to question ourselves on our origins through death trying to humanize itself. Ironicaly, it is the story of a pirate Captain being prisoner in his will for complete freedom.

Over-Shoot Objectives
If we get pas our goal of 6666$, we want to show you our commitment by focusing on further objectives to push the project further. We will also reward our contributors with free extra stuff.
For HD image Click HERE

Open Source Mentality
We cannot do a pirate project without passing by the contemporary form of individual piracy. We truly believe in the open source mentality and want to create an exchange around our stories.
As an example, the soundtrack and our artwork are not only free but OPEN SOURCE. HELL YEAH!
So use it. Pirate it. Remix It. Colour it. Photoshop it. If you want High Quality Artwork or Music tracks, write us at contribute@goldenbeardproject.com. Actually, our work is under a creative commons liscence.
Our overshoot objectives are to create more comic book episodes, more artwork, a full length soundtrack and to create a platform of collaboration.

Help us Spread the Word!
Please take a moment to share The Golden Beard Project with your friends on Facebook and Twitter by sharing our link or following us on the platforms. By sharing it, you're helping us to educate the public about the project and helping us to get one step closer to our quest of "Pirate world domination"!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES
The present risks our team face is mainly torwards deadlines since we all have main jobs to assure our living. By financing this project, you help us to get focused on this project for 3 months.
Another inhérent risk is food poison since we all will work together in David’s kitchen and that his culinary experiments sometimes are as spécial as his mind!

FAQ
Will the comic book be in full colour ? Only if we reach the 6 666$ funding !
What if you dont get fully funded ? We will produce 1 comic book @ 2222$ and 2 comic books @ 4444 $. In black and white. 
What if I only want 1 comic book and the full soundtrack ? You will be able to buy individual soundtracks from our Bandcamp.
Where would I be able to buy the extra comics ? The comics should be available on a web plateform to buy from. If not, we will use our Bandcamp plateform to sell goddies and issues temporarly.
 

 

Speak White ! En Français SVP!
Avant toute chose, sachez que Golden Beard (Barbe Or) est présentement lancé en Anglais afin de rejoindre un bassin d’auditeurs plus large. Basé à Montréal, notre équipe est majoritairement francophone et nous pouvons vous assurer que tous les produits qui découleront de notre production seront disponibles en Français.
Le Projet Golden Beard : 
Nous sommes une fabuleuse équipe multiculturelle de créateurs qui travaillent sur ce projet depuis plusieurs années. Puisque notre projet est une histoire de collaboration, sachez que près de 35 individus ont contribué dans ces divers produits dérivés.
La première trame sonore est disponible GRATUITEMENT. CLIQUEZ ICI
Afin de regarder certains de nos dessins de production CLIQUEZ ICI
Notre prochain projet est de faire 3 BD de 24p colorées et nous visons les sortir avant Halloween 2013! Nous souhaitons aussi faire des trames sonores uniques pour chaque BD qui va sortir afin d’enrichir l’expérience de lecture.
C’est pour ça qu’on a besoin de vous! La campagne IndieGogo nous sert à amasser des fonds afin de couvrir les coûts d’illustration, de couleur et d’impression. story:
About This Project

I am a Chicago based artist and filmmaker. My comic art appears in public spaces, literary publications, gallery exhibits and private collections. You can see my broad range of work at gretchenhasse.com.


Freaks' Progress is an epic story; it is a serialized twenty-first century morality play, presented as an electronic graphic novel. Funds raised through this campaign will allow me one month of time to focus on refining the storyline and beginning to build the website that will host the online episodes.

I am playing off of an old narrative form. Popular in the 15th and 16th centuries, morality plays presented melodramatic lessons about good conduct and character. A Rake's Progress, by William Hogarth, chronicled the moral decline of an English heir. Freaks’ Progress follows an entire community in their pursuit of success, with all the pitfalls and moral contradictions included.

The moral part of the struggle is key. As disembodied concepts, “Good” and “Evil” can seem fairly clear. But when those concepts land on earth and become enmeshed in politics and interpersonal relations, they can get pretty murky. This is the nature of the narrative in Freaks’ Progress. The meaning of and the combatants involved in any moral struggle can depend very much on who you are and where you stand.

The characters in Freaks’ Progress have grown with me through twenty years in Chicago. Some of them are fantastical in form, and some of them have lived experiences that place them in fantastical circumstances. In the story, I attempt to explore the deep heterogeneity we live with, and how that heterogeneity can create both deep understanding and radical confusion.

A trial version of the webcomic was online for a year in 2005. I learned a good deal about how to construct a site to host a long form serialized story. Since then, the characters and story have become much richer – and I am ready to relaunch.

The story will grow in installments, Charles Dickens style.

Some of the Freaks' Progress Characters

As a visual artist, I regularly include these characters as iconic images in my work.

Lupita

Lupita's family came to the States from Oaxaca when she was nine years old. Her father, a talented amatuer musician, owns a bar in a rapidly gentrifying neighborhood; he tries to move with the times by featuring local hipster bands. Smart and technically adept, Lupita sets up a pirate radio station with her friend Hazel when they are twelve years old. They form the band Las Piratas in their teens, for which Lupita plays bass and serves as technical wizard.

Max

Max worked in the circus and served as an assassin. Now he's a stripper. His friend and boss Guido says, "The thing about Max is, he's evil; but he's not a bad person." Max once tried, successfully, to leave the planet for a while so he could get his thoughts together and make a career change. More than anything, he wants to reconnect with Luis, the love of his life.

Andrea / Allison

Although many people can say that they struggle with conflicting emotions, the Twins live with two distinct personalities every day of their lives. Known affectionately to their friends as "War and Peace," their long history includes cult fame in underground music and film circles. Now they are just trying to make a living and rehab their house.

Hazel

Hazel is the daughter of two revolutionaries, neither of whom she has ever met. She lives with her grandmother Gladys and Gladys' twin sister Griselda, who for mysterious reasons lives currently as a disembodied head. This never bothers Hazel, as she is congenitally blind. She takes Griselda in a wagon on walks through the neighborhood. We first meet Hazel as a twelve year old girl starting up a pirate radio station with her friend Lupita. Later, the Twins give Hazel a guitar and she embarks on her life's mission, which is to become famous.

Guido

Guido is a survivor of politically motivated torture. He finds solace through a love of gardening. A passionate and relentless entrepreneur, he owns the club that employs most of the adult characters in the story. A community leader in spite of himself, he will regularly share his favorite recipes.

Clarence

Clarence is a modern day interpretation of Diogenes, the contrarian Greek cynic who chose a life of public poverty to critique a corrupt society. Clarence leads a tribe of “Nakeds,” intellectuals who disdain all private property, including clothes. But they live quite publicly; and in the process, as businessman Guido puts it, “they make naked look bad.”

More About Gretchen Hasse

My art practice spans several different mediums.

Recently I illustrated the front and back covers for Broken Records, Snezana Zabic's personal account of her teenage years during the Yugoslav Wars (available soon through Punctum Books).  In July, I had two mini-comics – one independent work, and one collaboration with writer Yasmin Nair – in a pop-up store during Comic Book Day at Chicago's Museum of Contemporary Art. This work was the result of a month-long residency at the Lady Drawers' exhibit Sex.Money.Race.Gender. at Columbia College Chicago's A+D Gallery.

My video work includes narrative shorts, music videos, and documents of protest actions, grassroots community development, and long term struggles for social justice. The story of Freaks’ Progress is influenced by my experiences as an artist, educator, social justice advocate, and resident of urban neighborhoods in transition.

story:
What Is Project Shamsheer?

Basically an art student's thesis project that grew beyond control. It started out as a single graphic novel written in Urdu, aiming to create a superhero that the Pakistani audience could relate to. 

But with the help of this campaign, we are turning Shamsheer into just the first of several titles in English, Urdu and several regional languages. Launching under the banner of 'Udham Publications', Shamsheer will be the masthead of the company and the first of several characters that we hope will become representative of the South Asian and particularly Pakistani culture.

Currently, this region of the world is almost entirely lacking in heroes, and a comic book culture is next to non-existent. Udham Publications is trying overcome these gaps with rich, resonating stories that can serve as a platform to bring together people of the region. To see why we think this is important, please watch the video above.


Who We Are

Udham Publications is currently a team of 3 comic book and anime lovers. 

  • The original concept of Shamsheer was developed by Salman Nasir, who is also the lead artist on the project and an illustrator and storyboard artist by profession
  • The bulk of story and concept is done by Zakaullah Khan, who has spent 9 years writing stories for brands in various advertising agencies
  • Danish Ejaz, with his 9 years as Account Management marshals our efforts and looks after all the business concerns that the rest of us creative types don't understand


What We Need & What You Get

Even if our comic book is as successful as we hope it will be, it'll be about a year before it is able to pay for itself. Till then, we need about $50,000 to pay for some more hands on the project (including an artist, a colorist and an additional writer), their systems and stationery, and a place to work in, all for one year without us going broke in the process. 

In return we can give you some rewards, depending on how much support you give us. Here's a little visual chart of what each level will get you:



(All the 'issues' mentioned in the rewards here and in the next section refer to the digital, English language version of the comic.)


Beyond The Goal

If you really show your love for Shamsheer and we go beyond our basic goal, we would be happy to do more for all of you that make it possible. 



Other Ways You Can Help

We don't need just money! If you can't contribute, or if you already contributed and still want to do more, please spread the word! You can do it any way you like, and to help you, there are several easy ways given above (just under the video). 


What if we Don't reach the Goal?!

We are now dedicated to launching Shamsheer, no matter what. So even if we don't reach our basic goal, we will still use whatever earnings we get to start the process, get one or two issues out. In this situation, we may have to go to investors and sell a share of the character... losing some amount of control over it in the process... but that's better than letting it die completely. Or we may have to approach mega brands and get sponsorship deals, which again invites interference of the brand over our content.

Of course, we would MUCH rather keep creative control of our boy Shamsheer, so *please* don't let us fall short.

Remember: Help Shamsheer and...

Thanks!

Udham Publications is trying overcome these gaps with rich, resonating stories that can serve as a platform to bring together people of the region. To see why we think this is important, please watch the video above.Who We AreUdham Publications is currently a team of 3 comic book and anime lovers. 

The original concept of Shamsheer was developed by Salman Nasir, who is also the lead artist on the project and an illustrator and storyboard artist by profession

The bulk of story and concept is done by Zakaullah Khan, who has spent 9 years writing stories for brands in various advertising agencies
Danish Ejaz, with his 9 years as Account Management marshals our efforts and looks after all the business concerns that the rest of us creative types don't understand
What We Need & What You GetEven if our comic book is as successful as we hope it will be, it'll be about a year before it is able to pay for itself. Till then, we need about $50,000 to pay for some more hands on the project (including an artist, a colorist and an additional writer), their systems and stationery, and a place to work in, all for one year without us going broke in the process. In return we can give you some rewards, depending on how much support you give us. Here's a little visual chart of what each level will get you:(All the 'issues' mentioned in the rewards here and in the next section refer to the digital, English language version of the comic.)Beyond The GoalIf you really show your love for Shamsheer and we go beyond our basic goal, we would be happy to do more for all of you that make it possible. Other Ways You Can HelpWe don't need just money! If you can't contribute, or if you already contributed and still want to do more, please spread the word! You can do it any way you like, and to help you, there are several easy ways given above (just under the video). What if we Don't reach the Goal?!We are now dedicated to launching Shamsheer, no matter what. So even if we don't reach our basic goal, we will still use whatever earnings we get to start the process, get one or two issues out. In this situation, we may have to go to investors and sell a share of the character... losing some amount of control over it in the process... but that's better than letting it die completely. Or we may have to approach mega brands and get sponsorship deals, which again invites interference of the brand over our content.Of course, we would MUCH rather keep creative control of our boy Shamsheer, so *please* don't let us fall short.Remember: Help Shamsheer and...Thanks!

story:
STOP READING RIGHT NOW.

Have you stopped? If so, good for you, you just made the best decision of your life. If not, you’re making a mistake. This whole page is one giant post-modern circle jerk. It’s a waste of perfectly GOOD TIME, TIME you could spend outside, being productive, helping people in NEED. Instead, you’re hunched in front of a screen, RUINING YOUR POSTURE, reading words that have no real reason for being written. The contents of this page include various reasons why you SHOULD NOT DONATE to it. Yes, THAT’S REALLY IT. It’s as stupid as that. Why would you ever want to donate to this page? Exactly! Glad we agree. Do not donate to this page. Do not share this page. Do you really want to infect society with this kind of drivel? How will your friends PAY ATTENTION TO THEIR SCREENS if you BOTHER them with the BULLSHIT of Do Not Donate. Don’t they have enough on THEIR PLATES? BIRDS that are ANGRY, CANDY that needs to be CRUSHED, and those TEMPLES won’t RUN THEMSELVES! FARMS need FARMING, SIMS need SIMMING and nobody wants to read the BRUTAL HONESTY of some NOBODY. What’s worse is, the person who created this page is a lonely, confused Caucasian male domesticated primate that lives on the planet Earth in a country some other primates named Canada. He is a spoiled little asshole who is too cynical and bitter for the world he lives in. This often gets him in trouble. He rarely gets outside and eats poorly. He does not have his shit together and you should not take his advice. Except to NOT donate to this page. He’s right about that. He is 26 years old and lives on his own with his cat Stone Cold Steve Austin.

Should you still be reading, you are not WELCOME, but nonetheless, this is DO NOT DONATE. The rules are simple.

1. Do not donate to this page.

2. The donate button is a LIE you invented IN YOUR MIND.

3. Should you know someone to donate, REPORT THEM IMMEDIATELY FOR EXECUTION.

4. WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT DONATE TO THIS PAGE!

Aren’t you more concerned with other Worthy Causes?

Every year we hear about some trendy new virus or disease that will wipe out life as we know it. Have you donated to the Cause of the Year? If the answer is no, you should not donate to this page. There are many Worthy Causes that need funding out there, and plenty of organizations where your money DEFINITELY isn’t used MOSTLY for clerical upkeep and salary. You should donate to one of these organizations, so that their organizers can continue to organize. Parties! Galas! This is how we eradicate disease, people. Big Pharma and The Governments have been researching for YEARS trying to find cures for what ails the human race. Look at all the Cures that have been discovered in the past 20 years! Look at how far modern medicine has come! This would not be possible without your generous donations. Don’t you want to feel SPECIAL when you spend your money? CHARITABLE even? You’re definitely donating to these organizations because you care about THE CAUSE right? Not because you feel guilty about something else and are displacing your feelings? Of course not! I don’t want any of your feelings. Keep your money. Do not donate to this page.

Speaking of The Governments, they need your money more than ever and the ridiculous taxes just won’t cut it anymore! The Governments need P.R. campaigns and they need them NOW! Bush, Harper, these are our modern day CRUSADERS, waging wars tht they have absolutely no profitable interest in. WARS ARE EXPENSIVE, PEOPLE! Look at all the pensions and services Governments are constantly blowing to bits! Do you think these activities and committees are free? Heck no, dummy! The Governments need to finance these firings and WHERE DO YOU THINK THE MONEY COMES FROM? Freedom isn’t free people, and you’ve got two arms and two legs anyway. You can afford to spend one of each. Stop being so selfish! This isn’t about you, this is about the arbitrary location on the planet Earth where you were expelled from a vagina. And that’s not all The Governments need money for! Why do you think they’re always hiding so much from the public? Because transparency costs money! Donate to your local chapter of The Governments RIGHT NOW so that they can finally reveal all the shady dealings and conspiracies none of us will ever hear about! Need to know? More like SPEND to know! Aren’t you curious about Roswell and 9/11? Send them your money and I’m SURE they’ll use it in ways that only benefit YOU DIRECTLY. Remember, each Government is special and different, and the Best Government Ever. They’re the only ones who know What’s Best For Us…until the next group comes along. Save your money for the next puppet show; this will improve your quality of life by leaps and bounds! You want your life to be properly run for you, don’t you? Show them in the only way they understand - with your wallet! Do NOT donate to this page!

I will probably spend all donations irresponsibly.

I do not have a TV, so I don’t see most of the ads you do. For this reason, I will likely spend ANY MONEY DONATED irresponsibly on STUPID necessities like rent, food, and books. I might do something REALLY CRAZY like finance the pretentious unpublished book of short stories and poetry I have written that NOBODY WILL EVER READ OTHERWISE. Did you just read what I wrote? I’m telling you I will use this money to pursue studies and art. I will be reading books while PERFECTLY GOOD NIGHTCLUBS will see none of this money. Aren’t you worried about your favourite HOT SPOT shutting down? Where else will you get to see all the SEXY SINGLES now, other than the Internet? Give THEM the money, or you might NEVER DANCE AGAIN! I am NOT COOL like YOU. You’re probably way, way COOLER than I am, anyway. Do you want to risk your HARD-FOUGHT SOCIAL STATUS by associating your wallet with a NERD like me? Nobody with a life would choose to waste their Monday writing garbage like this. Isn’t your entire identity based on what others think of you (or what you think others think of you)? Better to just give your paycheck to people that are Known As COOL. They’ll genuinely LOVE YOU. Like so many absent fathers, you could start showing your affection (or guilt) monetarily. Buy that pretty miss some flowers! Buy that handsome fella some flowers! Flowers are a really useful way of temporarily telling someone you love them. Give flowers to random strangers on the street. Put them in the barrels of guns. Remember, society says you are NOT ALLOWED to feel good about yourself unless it comes from an external source, and even then, only until the feeling wilts away. Redouble your desperate attempts to be One of THE FLOCK, and this time come armed with a $$MONEY GUN$$. Don’t donate it here, because I will not spend it on flowers that are found in nature ANYWAY. I am not cool. I will not add to society in any practical way. I will spend the money foolishly donated here frivolously. I might buy a crown and a goblet. I might develop a drug problem and you’ll be FORCED to LAUGH at me as my darkest moments are BROADCAST RIGHT INTO YOUR LIVING ROOM. Isn’t it fun when RICH PEOPLE get HURT and EMBARRASSED and YOU GET TO WATCH? Do you really want to HURT me? Do you really want to MAKE ME CRY? I am not a USELESS CELEBRITY, not yet anyway. I am just some little turd who likes satire. Celebrities champion Worthy CauseS all the time, which every single one of them CLEARLY CARES ABOUT SO MUCH. Sure, some celebrities have used their status to do real good in the world BUT THEY’RE NOT THE ONES YOU READ ABOUT IN THE PAPERS. Why do you think you see the smiling faces of beautiful, ideal, REAL, men and women while waiting in line at the SUPERMARKET? Next to the CHOCOLATES and CANDY and CONDOMS? Beautiful faces and slim, muscular bodies that are ENTIRELY REALISTIC. Don’t believe that ZEN BALONEY about there being no ideal man or woman, YOU KNOW THERE ARE and they smile at you EVERYWHERE so you can feel GOOD about yourself! SMILE BACK AT THEIR PERFECTLY ALTERED FACES. Pull down your blindfold, put in your headphones and follow them OFF A CLIFF. If all your friends jump off a bridge DO YOU WANT TO BE LAST ONE IN THE WATER? Furthermore, don’t bother with the introductory section of the page. We might never know who the author REALLY IS. How do YOU know he isn’t a DEMON, ALIEN, or WORSE, an AVERAGE WHITE GUY WITH RED HAIR. DO NOT TRUST HIM HE IS INSANE. There certainly can’t be MORE to life than The Church of the Dollar. Make an offering to the Church today! Take your hard earned money and SET IT ON FIRE. As the smoke rises to the sky and YOUR ONE TRUE GOD smiles down on you, hoard your money into a bonfire! You’ll need every dollar to TRULY FEEL SPECIAL so make sure you do NOT donate even a single PENNY to this page!

Don’t you have expenses?

Speaking of reasons you should NOT donate to this page, don’t you have EXPENSES to take care of? GAS ain’t going to be around forever, and it ain’t free! Look at how the prices spike up and down like the heart monitor of a TERMINAL PATIENT. Anybody with their eyes and ears open knows that it’s clearly due to a lack of funding. These people are literally TRANSFORMING THE PLANET and they make measly BILLIONS. We all know gas and car companies need MORE OF A MARKET SHARE. We all agreed to block the electric car and alternative energies THAT HAVE BEEN AROUND SINCE WORLD WAR 2 so they could KEEP PROFITING OFF US and that was COOL, but it WASN’T ENOUGH. These people are the REASON you can get to work so expensively! Without THEM you’d be NOTHING, and they tell you so every day by playing darts with your life savings. Alcohol and cigarette prices have also increased EXPONENTIALLY IN PRICE while retaining or losing ALL VALUE. Only one explanation makes sense and that these companies simply do not have the RESOURCES they need to SATISFY YOU, THE CUSTOMER. They raise prices to HELP YOU! Sure you might not be able to afford as much, but the SCARCITY they CREATE will make the infrequent CONSUMPTIONS feel SPECIAL. You’ll value them SO MUCH MORE. CHERISH THEM, even. They’re only BREAKING THE BANK to BUILD YOU BACK UP. You have a fiver in your pocket? YOU KNOW WHERE IT SHOULD GO. Get that new cell phone! Your current one will be useless within a few months ANYWAY, when the new operating software they release causes it to be OBSOLETE. Remember when appliances were BUILT TO LAST and not to LAST UNTIL THEY BREAK? Neither do I! That’s why you should give your FAVOURITE COMPANY a direct entry into your BANK ACCOUNT. You’re going to spend the money anyways, aren’t you? It doesn’t matter, close this page right now, DO NOT SLOW DOWN LONG ENOUGH TO DONATE, grab your Venti Latte and get out INTO THE REAL WORLD. Remember your SUBCONSCIOUS BRAINWASHING, that YOUR LIFE is MEANINGLESS UNLESS YOU ACHIEVE!

You are not ALLOWED to donate to this page

In addition to financial and logistical problems you’ll face if you donate to this page, this page is my personal property and I am NOT giving you PERMISSION to donate to it. If you know of any one donating to this page, please let me know RIGHT AWAY so I can write them a VERY ANGRY sounding thank you letter, or email, should they provide their various addresses. Furthermore, FREEDOM is an illusion. If you were really FREE you would be able to donate to this page, BUT YOU’RE NOT. YOU DON’T HAVE PERMISSION. On what grounds? Because I SAID so, SHITLORD. Think about that for a second, but not too long. That might hurt. Either way, if the best way to get a human to DO SOMETHING is to tell them NOT TO DO THAT THING, then THIS PAGE IS A LIE!!! including the previous sentence, the words before the comma five words ago, and how this sentence ends. Confused? Don’t be! Close this page right away and REPORT IT TO THE PROPER AUTHORITIES. Tell them this page is a dirty, no-good, commie, scum sucking LIE, or at least, it might be. Tell them I reserve the right to change and evolve my personal philosophy as my life progresses. I might not even be the SAME PERSON tomorrow, but that won’t hold up in THEIR COURTS. So remember: DON’T LET MY LIES INFECT YOU, you’re probably a well-adjusted, competent tax-payer and you don’t want to FALL IN with the WRONG CROWD. Save yourself and the authorities all the trouble and simply do NOT donate to this page.

CONCLUSION.

In conclusion, I hope you learned nothing from reading these useless words. My goal in writing this page was just to waste your time and mine and it looks like I SUCCEEDED, so suck it. There are MANY reasons you SHOULD NOT DONATE to this page. Should YOU DARE TO DONATE, I might have to CONTINUE wasting EVERYBODY’s time with more ESSAYS ON NOTHING. STICK UP FOR A BETTER SOCIETY. Put your money SOMEWHERE THAT MATTERS, like UNDER THE MATTRESS or your BOSS’ POCKET. I don’t want your money. I don’t need your money. I am VERY HAPPY being POOR. Isn’t that STRANGE?! LEAVE ME ALONE NOW, you’re making me ANXIOUS by STARING.

For any questions, too bad. Do not email seriouslydonotdonate@gmail.com. Do not follow @plsdontdonate on Twitter. These accounts are useless and will NEVER EVER EVER be responded to. I REFUSE to PERSONALLY ANSWER any QUESTIONS, INQUIRES, PROPOSITIONS, CONTRACTS, PROPHECIES, DISCIPLINARY SUMMONS, SWEEPSTAKES, F4F REQUESTS, TBTS, ANYTHING WITH THE WORD EPIC, ANYTHING CONTAINING A HASTAG (ESP. #BLESSED), PRAISE, BLAME, SHAME, FAME, or even to my NAME.

NOW I WILL SAY ONE LAST THING. I DON’T WANT YOU TO READ IT. CLOSE THE PAGE.

WHEREEVER YOU ARE

WHATEVER YOU DO

PLEASE

I’M BEGGING YOU

DO NOT DONATE TO THIS PAGE!

story:
Short Summary

I've been drawing comics for a year or so and have made a couple zines of comics.  I started an hourly comic project to force myself to work on my discipline, or in simple terms, to make myself do a lot of drawing.  And, i am!  I'm spending about three or four hours a day drawing comics right now, and it's great. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need funding for this project for a few reasons:

* printing a zine or mini-book sized collection of all of these comics at the end of january is going to cost some money, particularly if i print books. 

* i'm self-employed and taking time away from my work to do this project. 

* i'm actually going through a lot of drawing pens! 

Whether i reach my funding goal or not, any money i make here is going into printing  costs, drawing supplies, or giving me the funds to be able to spend time drawing comics. 

 

What do you get for helping to fund this project? 

Some, any or all of the following:  

* The finished zine! (or book?)  (60-90 pages, ish, of not fit for society hourly comics) 

* stickers from the zine

* patches from the zine

* magnets from the zine

* prints of fancy versions of some of my favourite comics from the zine

* other zines i've written

 

The Impact

Part of the appeal of this project to me is that i've read other people's monthly comics projects and i know for a fact that they're fascinating and really addicting to read.  

This has also already been a really healthy experience for me.  Documenting what i do with every hour of every day makes me work harder to do things that are worthwhile.  It's also creating an interesting heightened awareness of what's going on 

Hopefully, writing/drawing about whatever life experiences i'm going through will be helpful to anyone else struggling with related experiences.  It helps to know that we all fuck up, get confused, get overwhelmed, etc, as well as get excited, play, and live life the best we can.

In terms of my ability to complete this project, i feel really good about it.  I already have ten half-size pages of comics drawn.  I expect the finished, month-long zine or book to be somewhere between 60 and 90 half-sized pages.   I've made a couple of zines before, and this feels like a reasonable goal.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Help get the word out!  

As well as sharing this project on indiegogo, check out/follow/reblog my tumblr:

http://notfitforsociety.tumblr.com/

or my etsy shop: 

http://ofcourseyoucan.etsy.com

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
My name is Tom Hart and I’m a cartoonist and the creator of bunch of graphic novels, comic strips and mini-comics most notably the character Hutch Owen, and I’ve also been an instructor of core classes at New York City’s School of Visual Arts for 10 years.

I’ve decided to take what I’ve what I’ve gathered and accomplished here and what I’ve learned as a teacher in one of the finest art schools in the country, and move to a mellow place to open the kind of school I always wish I had gone to. An informal but intensive place in an affordable artistic town.

It will be called The Sequential Artists Workshop, and it will be in a place I love: sunny, swampy, punky Gainesville, Florida. To start, it will be an small, informal, intensive school to learn all the aspects of becoming a cartoonist. Writing, drawing, thinking, history, responding. From there, we’ll grow as we need to grow, and as the students need us to grow. Whether that means accreditation, or granting an MFA or not granting an MFA or whatever (undergrad accreditation will probably be an short term goal.), we’ll see what’s possible and what the needs of the people coming to the school are.

That’s one reason we are calling it The Sequential Artists Workshop, because our focus is on the student: making the student an artist. And making the artist able to work.

As a teacher I've helped countless amazing amazing students at SVA become artists, and if we build this school correctly, I hope to attract countless more, because they are certainly out there. Cartooning and graphic novels, etc. are becoming bigger and bigger. I tutor and teach to more and more people who are fascinated by this medium but don’t know it’s workings or don’t know its history, or who just need time and mentoring to practice and work. We want to be a place to for those people to work, learn the form and become sequential artists.


THE SEQUENTIAL ARTISTS WORKSHOP

The plan is for the school to begin operating with an intensive single-year certificate program. 5 classes a week, two-three hours a day. There would be an exercise-driven comix class, a project-centered studio class, and classes in drawing and technique and also history, culture and context.

Our great instructors will include my wife Leela Corman (whose illustrated dozens of books and whose giant graphic novel Unterzakhn comes out from Pantheon spring 2012), and Dan Stepp, who did terrific comics in the mid 90s and now focuses on these great weird narrative oils paintings, bringing in formal ideas from renaissance painting with modern accoutrements and motifs. Other instructors we’ll find in the ensuing year.

WHY GAINESVILLE?

Gainesville, Florida is the perfect place for this kind of school for a number of reasons, not the least of which is the connection to the University of Florida. At UF, there are a dozen or so men and women who study graphic novels and comics history as a regular practice. They host a yearly academic seminar there where they’ve flown down luminaries like Dan Clowes, Kim Deitch, Dylan Horrocks, Joe Sacco, etc. The school is a place interested in sequential art.

Next, the town itself is arty, and very DIY. There are always new cafes, stores, bands, cooperative organizations, and art studios opening up, it’s got good theater, good movies, good bookstores, small film festivals, live music, an amazing, arty pizza place, lots to do for free, etc. It’s also completely bike-able, with plenty of bike lanes on important avenues.

It’s also beautiful. There’s Spanish Moss hanging from every tree, giant water birds, and little lizards walk around, bats fly in the evening, and a perfect climate fall, winter and spring. It’s hot in the summer but still lovely, often with  brief daily thunderstorms to break the heat.

YOUR TAX-DEDUCTIBLE DONATIONS

To start the school we need to file lots and lots of forms and fees to the State of Florida Department of Education and their Commission of Independent Education. But before we can apply for a license to do that, we need to have secured a correctly zoned space etc. There are lots of great, empty spaces in Gainesville, warehouses and raw 2nd floor commercial spaces especially. If we can secure a place long enough to get our forms filled out, then we’ve made it past the first hurdle.

That’s our goal, is to make it through this first hurdle. Finding and securing a space, filing our forms with the Florida DOE and CIE.

Your donations will help us do that.

We’re setting a goal of $7000 for this first round, which we hope to augment with grants and other donations. Feel free to kick us far beyond that because a lot is needed that can go to rent and marketing in these first few months. As added perks, we’ve got original drawings by John Porcellino and Leela, original art by Nick Bertozzi, Jason Little and others, original strips by me, prints by Vanessa Davis, Josh Bayer and other stuff, please see the page.

Your donations above and beyond our $7K goal will go to further rent, inspections and insurances, shelves for books and tools, drawing tables and chairs, and hopefully even computers and printing materials, so please feel free to push us far beyond that number!

Also realize that your donations, through IndieGogo or through our website are Tax-Deductible. Our project is being sponsored by Fractured Atlas, a non-profit arts support organization and as such your donations are tax-deductible. Visit our website if you more information about our school-to-be; we’re really excited about it and think it’s going to be a great place to learn about comic art, and to discover your vision and become a cartoonist.

www.sequentialartistsworkshop.org

PS- REGARDING THANK YOU GIFTS:

You have to leave a public comment about which posters you want or which original art you want, OR send us a private email at thesaw@sequentialartistsworkshop.org

Also, the "$400 Original Art Preview Link is broken and can't be fixed. It's this: http://sequentialartistsworkshop.org/wordpress/...

Please note that there are only a few of those pages available at any one time. Be sure to comment or ask in the comments field if unsure.

story:
Our Story

My name is Dan Bublitz Jr., I'm an aspiring stand up comedian.  I haven’t been in the business very long, but I’ve I had many great opportunities that I have helped on my journey.  I now have another opportunity; I’ve been invited to perform at the Laugh Track Comedy Festival in July 15th and 16th.  This is a new festival as it’s only in its 2nd year, but it is a great opportunity to network with other comics and film makers.  I just moved to a couple of weeks ago, and the move went over my budget.  I am looking for a job to support myself while I try to break into the comedy scene in , but I don’t think I will have a job in time to pay for my trip to .

 

$300 will be used for gas and the other $300 will be used for food and lodging. 


Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by telling all your friends that might want to help about this campaign!  Spread the word!

story:
Vigilance: The vigilant defender

 

Created by Devon Camel who both writes and illusttrates the series.

Vigilance is a story over seven years in the making. It's a story about a young man that learns that he's a greater purpose in his life than other guy's his age. He learns that he is an alter-sapien, a person born with enhanced abilities like increased speed, strength and agility.

aside from learning his new abilities, he discovers that he comes from a legacy of a masked crimefighter named Vigilance which was a mantle that was once taken by his father and his grandfather before him and now after experiencing tragedies in his own life, young Ezekiel washington dons the mask of his forefathers to take on a mysterious terrorist that has plagued the streets of Baren Acres known only by the identity of T.H.U.G(Terrorism, hatred, under greed). Unknown to Ezekiel, the evil terrorist and him have more in common than he thinks.

 

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to raise $2500 to cover the cost of printing the graphic novel and paying for tables at comic conventions and creating promotional items such as t-shirts, stickers etc. to create the fan base for the character and the graphic novel.

I know that this can't happen without support and that's where you, the people come in. By making generous donations towards this project shows that there is room for a different type of hero (nothing against Marvel or DC) and that independent stories can be told and enjoyed as well.

here are a few things to offered for those that support the dream:

The anti-bullying issue where Ezekiel deals with a young man being bullied in his school.

the chacter biography book which contains character art and production material for the series(sort of like the bonus features on a dvd lol)

and more

The Impact

This campaign means a great deal in the fact everyone has dreams and that dreams can only come true if you pursuit them for everyone that donates towards this project is helping to support a dream I've been pursuiting since I was 13years old. I've always loved comics and animation and always wanted to tell my own stories and through supporting this project I get to share the stories that I always wanted to tell with the world and inspire others as I have been inspired in my pursuit of publishing comics.

Other Ways You Can Help

Outside of donating you can help by sharing this campaign with your friends and family spread the word to everyone you can to support a project with great characters, awesome  storyline and great artwork.This is the villain of the graphic novel T.H.U.G. (terrorism.hatred.under.greed.) who is he and what secrets lie in his appearance in the city baren acres are soon to be revealed.

 

Thanks for all the support.

 

 
 
 
 
This is the first three pages of the anti-bullying comic called "Consequential actions" I personally know what it's like to be picked on for being different so the fact that bullying has gotten to the point of being life threatening then something has to be said so I thought my character should speak to social problems outside of all the superhero stories I'll tackle social issues within the aspect of my personal comic book series.
This is the cover art for the anti-bullying issue called "Consequential actions" the story is about a kid named Dennis who is bullied by three boys and only Vigilance aka Ezekiel Washington is the only one that can save the young man from making a life-altering mistake.

story:
Please you this as a link to my Comedy Channel: www.youtube.com/thecomedyofjones ... Enjoy!! There are many more comedy videos on this link....

I am wanting to raise funding so I can keep producing comedy videos. I am now wanting to produce higher quality videos, where I can afford to hire costumes, use professional makeup, wigs and more lavish costumes. The cost off supporting actors, film crew, travel and rehearsal expenses.

I particularly love producing spoofs, parody's and creating my own characters. I am currently writing a spoof on Beyonce's Love On Top, which with the help of this funding, will be my next video. Additionally to this I am writing my own characters, which i will write, film, produce and host on my Channel. I hope this character will eventually have a channel of his own.

I have big ideas, with the hope of making a professional career out of comedy. I'm using Youtube as a platform to host my comedy. When I happy with my collection I then hope to send these onto casting directors, producers and directors.

Thank You

Simon Jones
