Your support shows that people want more comics like this
We know we do.  Do you, too?

What you get
The comic, Literally #1, plain and simple.  Every backer, even for $1, gets a free link to the copy, either on a digital platform, or a PDF, or something like that.  Printing costs much more, and coloring the comic is still a stretch goal.

If you can't pay?Spread this around on all the social media sites to let people know that we need everyone's help.

story:
A Music Video to Promote a Comic Book?

Yes! I am comic book writer/creator, Preston Poulter.  Previously I've gotten some great feedback with my first series, White Lily.  Now I'm ready to launch my next comic book series, Guinevere and the Divinity Factory.

  • In creating this book I borrowed some elements from Harry Potter and The Great Gatsby to craft a magical, urban fantasy setting that shows the decadence of a magical elite set in a society consumed by an grim outside world that has been subtly enslaved by a dark spiritual force. 
  • Actress and model, Juliette Kida, gave Guinevere, the apprentice mage, main character of our story, her appearance and had an opportunity to reprise the role in real life in our music video. 
  • Hollywood looks to the comic world for their next movie franchise. Obviously many of the blockbusters we see are based on comic books, but also movies such as Atomic Blonde, Kingsman, and I Kill Giants all started as small indie comic books. By making this project a success today, you help shape tomorrow's world of movies and television. 

We've shot a great looking video, and rendered an awesome comic book

Now we need your help to get the music video edited complete with visual special effects. As for the rewards, we have many perk levels that appeal to fans who want a direct connection to their creators, including: 

  • DRM Free downloadable links of the music video and the comic book. 
  • Physical copies of the comic book as well as signed artistic prints.

Risks & Challenges

The raw footage of the story has already been shot. All we need to do is edit it together. 

The comic book also stands ready to be fulfilled. Having already completed two successful crowdfunding campaigns, we stand ready to fulfill your pledges regardless of the funding status of the project. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this project. Read the other comics I've produced and join us on Facebook at these pages for: 

  • Guinevere and the Divinity Factory
  • Pocket Jacks Comics
  • Juliette Kida 

One of the best ways to stay in touch with us is to join our mailing list

For those of you on Instagram:

  • My page
  • Juliette's Page

Below is the regular cover of the comic book, which is the image that will be used for the T-shirt. 

Here are the other five images that make up the set of six comic images for the trading cards and 11x17 prints.

Perks

At certain reward levels, you will receive metal trading cards. Here is what they look like: 

 

And here is 11x17 Full Metal Prints:

story:
We are raising money for art supplies and printing costs to bring the Ladies of Market Street to your hands... I mean the comic book. I can't actually get you the ladies...


Short Summary

Ladies of Market Street is an original comic book.  What is it about? 

Veronica Baldwin, disguised as a man infiltrates a human trafficking ring headquartered in the dank basement of a normal suburban house in New Jersey. She is on a mission to save her stolen sister. She’s on her own and she knows it: Veronica is a New York City Madam, well acquainted with the seedy underground of organized crime. The arm of the law is not long enough to touch the powerful puppeteer pulling the strings behind the slave ring. When she learns that her sister has been executed by this malefactor she is ready to fight fire with fire. 

Who are the creators of Ladies of Market Street?

Trey, the artist, and Emily, the author, are local artists in Des Moines Iowa.  After meeting Trey at a local art show, Emily realized he was the only one who could bring her Ladies alive on the page.  Working together they want to bring you the 15 book series of Ladies of Market street.  They just need a little help getting started.  Emily asked Trey to just use some coal from her fire pit, but Trey insists on having actual art supplies. So off they go with their crowd funding campaign. 


What We Need & What You Get

This Indiegogo campaign is for the first issue of Ladies of Market Street.  We need to raise money for art supplies and printing costs!

With your help we will be able to produce the first issue in this series, with a projected 14 or more issues to follow.

In order to bring this first book to life, Trey will use traditional comic book making tools of the trade, such as ink and brush work. When the art is completed, he will then scan it, add the dialogue, and touch up any flaws or mistakes in the art. From there, the files containing the comic pages and covers will be sent to the printer. Finally, the completed comic book will be ready to be shipped out to you, our awesome supporters!

We plan on printing 100 copies of the first book to bring to Comic book conventions and art shows. This will be on top of the issues printed especially for backers who want a physical copy or earn one in our perks! We will also be offering the first issue as a digital download.

Once that first book is made available to our public, we will immediately begin work on the second book and continue the trend!

To show our appreciation to those who fund us and help us reach our goal, we have created some amazing perks.  We will be offering 3 unique, high quality art prints, all made from art work drawn and painted by Trey. 


Depending on your pledge level, you can chose from one, two,  or even all three prints. If you pledge high enough, you can even chose to receive one of the original pieces of art the prints are based on. 


For the highest levels, we will also offer a page of the original comic art itself!  Emily will be giving copies of her novel, Benvolio.  Check out all of our perks and choose your level of donation and see just how generous the Ladies are!

The Impact

We are excited to bring an original, unique , and above all entertaining story into the world. We have a passion for story telling, especially sequential art, and we are looking forward to adding our voices to the ever expanding chorus of independent, creator owned comic books. So, get ready for some great story telling and amazing art work as you lose yourself in the world of the Ladies. 

Risks & Challenges

 The biggest challenge for us is getting the funds to bring this story to life. We are both independent creators with families to support and bills to pay, and  paying for the production of a brand new comic series by ourselves is a little more than we can afford at the moment. And this is exactly why crowdfunding is so awesome! If you donate in the name of entertaining fun, then we will deliver!

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell everyone you know about us.  Tell them in person, tell them on twitter, tell them via your soup can phone.  Just tell everyone.  Please… oh and THANK YOU!

The Most Important Thing

It is very important to us that this comic book excites and entertains you.  This project is something we are having so much fun working on and we want you to share in that with us. 

So Thank You All for being a part of this and helping us spread the work and complete this first issue.  We can’t wait to share it with all of you. 

Thank You 

As of last night we have made it to the half way point in our campaign!!  Trey and I would like to take a moment to thank the people who have pledged to Ladies of Market Street.  Your support and belief in our project has inspired us and we are very excited to move forward.  So what does this milestone mean for us?  Well as we stated, we are raising money for art supplies and printing costs, and as of now we have raised all the  money needed for the art supplies.  That means that Trey will begin work on the first book today!!! And as a proper thank you and an inspiration to all who are thinking of pledging we will now post below, the first 5 pages of the first book of Ladies of Market Street!!!

story:
Ms. Lynx print available with the "Three of a Kind" perk!

THE BALLAD OF DUSTY TORTILLAS #1

My name is Brendan Kemp, creator and co-writer of "TBODT". The team and I are extremely excited to bring you the first issue of an ongoing series  introducing you to a rich world inhabited by dynamic characters and period accurate set pieces. Our project is being cowritten by my brother, Stephen Kemp, with interior art by industry veteran Nick Garber and colors by DC Alonso of Dark Horse and IDW fame.

The goal of this campaign is to provide the highest quality product for our customers as possible. Every element of the story has been constructed with painstaking detail in order to ensure that the reader experiences the escapism that the comic book medium seems to have lost in recent history. 

On behalf of the team I'd like to thank you for considering this project. Its our sincerest hope that you will come to love these characters and share the enthusiasm for the story that we do. Now saddle up and enjoy the ride as we discover that for Dusty and his friends, the end of the wild west was just the beginning.

story:
xBlack Forest 

Krampus Kobolds evil elves and creatures of the night. Germany has such rich history and folklore. To be honest, creepy as hell. I am going to tell you a story about some of the forgotten or ignored supernatural beings.

  • I’m Mike Angerhauser along with Betty Brighteyes we hope to weave an amazing tale
  • I want people to know us and if funded, tell more forgotten creepy tales. 
  • Rohan is an exiled warrior who follows creatures into the Black Forest in a blood lust filled action packed horror adventure. 

Our goal is 5000 US dollars to cover shipping and print. 

Black Forest A forgotten soldier; battle-hardened from a life of war and bloodshed is banished to the mythical Black Forest. There he will battle the creatures of Germanic Folklore but, also, his own inner demons. In a world of nightmares, a hero can awaken.

New tiers will be added to help troops and widows and orphans of 9/11. 

Pages and updates will be made daily.  Book will be approximately 46 pages black and white.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • I am of German descent and need to tell these tales.
  • We are 100 percent dedicated to this and will make the best possible comic.

 

Other Ways You Can Help https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqLk5YCJXEBX6L... or angry comics on Twitter.

story:
The Artbook                                             

REGROWTH is to be a 70-page black and white artbook with a full color cover. It contains commissions, fanart, personal illustrations, layout exercises, character designs, and small selections of finished comic pages. The general theme is "mystical melancholy entwined with nature"- a concept which I hoped to reflect in both the book cover, and in the companion print Efflorescence.



Of course, I have many upgrades that I still have in mind for the artbook and the overall package. Here is a list of our stretch goals:

 

Who is the artist?                                   ​

I'm Irene, and I'm a Taiwanese-American illustrator and storyteller who has worked on Gwenpool (Marvel), Deadpool Family (Marvel), SILK (Marvel), Archer (FX), and many other franchises. Currently I'm striving to become a crowdfunding expert, to bring my original comic Fiendish into reality, and of course to produce REGROWTH!
 

Perks                                                          

Here are the perks available at campaign-only prices.
Delivery of the digital items are planned for November 2019, while delivery of the physical items are planned for early December 2019.

 

Funds Usage                                            

Some supplemental items such as the enamel pin have already been manufactured, and are just waiting to ship.  The artbook is 100% complete, with a printer lined up- all that is left to do is to fund it! Here are how the funds we raise will be distributed:

I chose flexible funding to ensure that whether or not we reach our goal, you will receive the items you ordered. If our initial goal is not met, I will simply adjust the print run according to the resources available.
 

Challenges                                               

I have been making products such as prints, pins, and comics for conventions for over 10 years, and am well-versed in working with printers and factories. Therefore, I do not foresee any major problems with the manufacturing process. The only hurdle we may have is with the shipping, since as of right now I am taking care of the shipping myself. In the event that it becomes unrealistic for me to pack and ship all the orders alone, however, I will reallocate some of the packaging funds to hire some friends to help me, in order to ensure your perks are delivered within a reasonable time frame.
 

Other Ways You Can Help                     ​

Even if you cannot back the campaign, you can still help by sharing this page and spreading the word for REGROWTH! I appreciate any and all support, and every share may be that crucial push that takes us across the finishing line. Thank you!

Find and follow me on these other sites:
PORTFOLIO    |   YOUTUBE    |    TWITTER    |    INSTAGRAM    |    PATREON
 

 

Product mockups made with help from Covervault and Freepik

Therefore, I do not foresee any major problems with the manufacturing process. The only hurdle we may have is with the shipping, since as of right now I am taking care of the shipping myself. In the event that it becomes unrealistic for me to pack and ship all the orders alone, however, I will reallocate some of the packaging funds to hire some friends to help me, in order to ensure your perks are delivered within a reasonable time frame. 

Other Ways You Can Help                     ​
Even if you cannot back the campaign, you can still help by sharing this page and spreading the word for REGROWTH! I appreciate any and all support, and every share may be that crucial push that takes us across the finishing line. Thank you!
Find and follow me on these other sites:PORTFOLIO    |   YOUTUBE    |    TWITTER    |    INSTAGRAM    |    PATREON 

 
Product mockups made with help from Covervault and Freepik

story:
Please Note: Free shipping on all perks!

Howdy all.  My name is Doug Hopkins and I am the creator of Robot Western.  Thank you wholeheartedly for checking out my campaign.  I am a published author/illustrator and this is my first comic book series.  Initially, Robot Western was to be a children's book but the scope of the story matured and grew so immensely that it could only be contained inside a comic book series.

The best news is, if this goal is not reached, all pledges will still be honored for we will utilize a ‘print on demand’ resource so you will still get these great comics in your hands. Issue #1 is completed and is ready to send your way. The funds raised will go toward the printing of issue #2 which is our initial goal. After we reach our first milestone, we have some great stretch goals planned. The creation of issue #3 has begun but we need funds to finish the art to complete that book as well.

It is our hope and joy to offer you the first issues of Robot Western: The Comic Book Series, and other awesome rewards, for your much-needed support and backing.  

Issue #1 is ready to send your way.  Pledge for the printed copy and you will receive the first issue of this incredible tale.  Here is how we package our comics straight from the Dodge Central Press.  And it also comes with the first of our collector cards, free.

Our main focus for launching this campaign is to raise funds for the printing of Issue #2.

The amount of work and passion that has gone into this project is astounding and with your enthusiasm and generous support we can bring this continuing saga to the pages of issue #2.

Another great reward is ‘The Art of Robot Western’ book, which details the development, designs and concept art that helped form the Robot Western universe.

story:
ALL ITEMS WILL BE SHIPPED BY MAY 10

Thanks again to all the contributors! Stay tuned for ULTRA 3!

 

 

 

 

The Story: Jack is searching. Searching for answers. Searching for his true purpose.

 

Set in Dren City in 2041. Working as an enforcer for an underground crime syndicate, the violent things Jack has done are finally catching up to him. Disgusted with what he has become, Jack decides to leave everything behind, and leave Dren city with his only real friend, but there is no escaping the truth. Something is lurking inside Jack, an ancient gene, embedded in his DNA, the reason he was so good at his job, Something. . . more than human. With his plans to leave the city, Jack is stunned to learn his best friend has gone missing. Knowing the horrible things that go on in Dren City, Jack fears the worst. As Jack searches for his missing friend, an evil beyond comprehension awaits him.

ULTRA is the tragic horror story of a man troubled by his complicated past, and forced to confront the demon within himself. Set in the future of a visually stunning, broken world of violent street gangs, amidst everything from drug lords modified with cybernetic arms, to occult rituals held in underground facilities. ULTRA’s world is savagely ethereal and soul-stirring.

Each issue will have 20 interior pages in black and white, 6.7"x 10.2".

The Indiegogo:   All funds raised will go toward ULTRA #1 and #2 production costs.  So if you support creator-owned comics, and want to help ULTRA become a reality, there are some great rewards for you. 

 

 

Exclusive ULTRA T-Shirt

Exclusive ULTRA fine art print 14"x12" Archival paper

story:
Hello and welcome to our campaign!

Nous vous saluons à notre promotion!

Our-Lady- of-the-Swallows is a full color, 120 page Greek graphic novel by George Tsiamantas, based on Marguerite Yourcenar's short-story of the same name.

It's a fascinating story about the sanctity of nature, which is life itself with all its contradictions. A story about love and fear. About transformation and regeneration. Conflict and reconciliation. The new religion of Christianity and the ancient myths of Greek mythology.

In the short story by Margueritte Yourcenar, one of the most prominent figures of French literature, we find ourselves at the dawn of the Middle Ages. A monk reaches Attica after leaving Egypt and strives to eliminate the river Nymphs. He persuades the frightened peasants to aid him. But the lustful deities of nature will find an unexpected ally...

"Simple, elegant and magical. Reminiscent of the best of Joann Sfar."
Mike Carey

It's an ambitious project to which we've been devoted with passion for almost two years. After meticulous research, the illustrator and comics creator George Tsiamantas, in collaboration with the philologist Vangelis Psarianos, depicts the time and place of the story as accurate as possible. In doing so, the graphic novel does not only satisfy comic book enthusiasts but its inspiring and gripping images can be used for educational purposes as well.


Thanks to George's beautiful illustrations and the persisting efforts of the non-profit Greek comics publisher, Comicdom Press, we managed to obtain the publishing rights in Greek, but mainly the rights for the adaptation of the story into a comic. Something that is attempted for the first time anywhere in the world with one of Yourcenar's works.

We hope that with your valuable support this project will be realized,paving the way for possible publications in French and English.

«Notre-Dame des Hirondelles» est un roman graphique en grec, en couleur, composé de 120 pages, illustré par Georges Tsiamantas, illustrateur des bandes dessinées. Ce roman graphique est la représentation en image du récit,au même titre, de Marguerite Yourcenar.

Il s'agit d'une histoire fascinante qui parle du caractère sacré de la nature. Ce caractère sacré n'est pas autre chose que la vie elle-même pleine de toutes ses contradictions. C'est alors une histoire qui présente l'amour (éros) et la peur, la métamorphose et la renaissance, le conflit et la réconciliation, la nouvelle religion (apparue à ce temps-là) de christianisme et les Nymphes archaïques de la légende grecque.

Ce récit de Marguerite Yourcenar, ( une des auteures les plus importantes de la littérature et des lettres françaises) nous dépayse complètement en nous voyageant au commencement du moyen Âge, au moment où un moine d' Egypte arrive à Athènes (Attique) et il se combat afin d'éliminer les fées de la rivière, en persuadant les paysans terrifiés de l'aider. Mais les divinités sensuelles de la nature trouvent un allié inattendu...

Un projet ambitieux sur lequel on travaille passionnément et avec une devotion totale depuis 2 ans. L' illustrateur et créateur des BD, Georges Tsiamantas, en collaboration avec le professeur de lettres Vagelis Psarianos, ont élaboré la recherche nécessaire pour qu'ils puissent enfin reconstituer vraisemblablement le paysage et l'époque présenté dans cette histoire. Tout cela a un but double ; tout d'abord fasciner les amateurs de BD, mais en plus de pouvoir utiliser ce roman graphique pour des raisons éducatives via les images charmantes et inspirées de l'artiste.

"Simple, élégant et magique.
Plein de meilleurs souvenirs de Joann Sfar."
Mike Carey

Grâce aux belles images de Georges Tsiamantas, et les efforts persistants de la maison des éditions (à but non lucratif) Comicdom Presse, nous avons réussi à aquérir les droits d'édition en langue grecque, mais plus spécifiquement le virement du récit de Marguerite Yourcenar en BD, un projet ambitieux qui est tenté pour la première fois en ce qui concerne l'oeuvre de Yourcenar.

Nous espérons que grâce à votre aide précieuse, cette édition puisse se réaliser et ouvrir le chemin à d'autres éditions pareilles en langue française et anglaise.

“Απλό, καλαίσθητο και μαγικό. 
Φέρνει στον νου τα καλύτερα του Joann Sfar.” Mike Carey

About the creator

George Tsiamantas was born in 1975, in Trikala, Greece. He graduated from the Graphic Design Department of the School of Graphic Arts, Design and Art Studies of Athens and worked as a graphic designer. He has been involved with scenoraphy, costume design and graphic design for theatrical performances and has illustrated calendars and books for children. “Our Lady of the Swallows” is his first graphic novel and he is currently working on a new board game. He lives in the ruins of Athens along with two snails. 

In the creation of the graphic novel, George worked closely with the philologist Vangelis Psarianos and editor Elias Katirtzigianoglou.

For more on the project and the team behind it, please visit our web-site.

À propos du créateur

Georges Tsiamantas naquit en 1975 à Trikala (Thessalie). Il étudia des arts graphiques à l'école des arts graphiques et des études artistiques de l'école professionnelle et technique d'Athènes. En étant graphiste il s'occupa aussi du domaine théâtral (scénographie, costumes, graphistes de représentations théâtrales) mais en plus il illustra et créa plusieurs livres et calendriers pour les petits enfants. «Notre-dame des Hirondelles» est son premier graphic novel ; mais en parallèle il travaille sur la création d' un jeu de société. Il habite au centre d'Athènes près des vestiges du passé à la compagnie de deux escargots. 

Georges Tsiamantas dans son travail de créer ce roman graphique est encadré par le professeur de lettres Vagelis Psarianos et l'éditeur Ilias Katirtziyianoglou.

Pour des informations supplémentaires sur ce projet et l'équipe derrière tout cela, veillez visitez s'il vous plaît notre site web.

What We Need & What You Get

Δείτε τις πληροφορίες και  τη λίστα των 'ανταλλαγμάτων/perks' στο site μας και επιστρέψτε για να κάνετε την συνεισφορά σας!

We need your support to complete the project and proceed with its publication. Our goal is 2000 €. This amount (after taxes) will cover the printing cost, artists' fees and shipping. In return for your support you will receive a choice of perks.

These are the items you can get as a "thank you" for being part of Our-Lady-of-the-Swallows. Please check the perks sidebar on the right to see how they are combined and how you can get them.

Please add 5 € for shipping anywhere BUT Greece. For the Retailers Pack please add 30 € for shipping in Europe and 40 € for anywhere else in the world.

Vous pouvez devenir vous aussi un partenaire de ce travail

Nous avons besoin de votre aide afin que cette œuvre s'accomplisse et se publie. Notre but est de ramasser un somme de 2000 euros ; un somme (sans les taxes) qui couvrira les frais de publication, les frais d 'envoi et le remboursement de l'artiste. À l'échange de votre soutien, nous vous présentons une variété d'offres pour que vous choisissiez celle que vous convient. 

Un grand merci pour votre soutien ; vous pouvez choisir entre autres :(observez, à droite de la page, il y a une colonne verticale avec les offres, leur combinaison et ce que vous pouvez obtenir) 

S'il vous plaît veillez à inclure les frais d'envoi (5€) partout dans le monde en exception de la Grèce. Pour les libraires: Autrement veillez à inclure 30€ (frais d'envoi) tarif Europe et 40€ si le destinataire de cet envoi réside hors d' Europe. 

ΟUR LADY OF THE SWALLOWS Graphic novel

The main offer is a high quality edition of the comic. The 120 pages book features the complete story as well as an alternate-drawn ending. It will be printed in full color and is 23x30 cm in size. The book will be signed and a character sketch of your choosing (not necessarily from the story) will be drawn inside. This perk will be shipped as soon as the book is finished and printed, approx early April 2014.

Notre-Dame des Hirondelles ; le roman graphique

L'édition : en roman graphique en 120 pages colorés (23x30cm). À part de l'histoire narrée, le livre présente une scène finale alternative. Vous pouvez obtenir le roman graphique signé, avec le croquis d'un personnage de votre choix (ce personnage ne peut pas être obligatoirement un héros pris de notre livre Notre-Dame des hirondelles, il peut être n'importe héros / personnage). Finalement votre nom sera présent sur la liste de ceux que nous remercions! Notre édition vous sera envoyée dès que le roman graphique sera publié, probablement au début d' avril 2014. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ΟUR LADY OF THE SWALLOWS eBook

You can have a digital version of the graphic novel. A downloadable PDF file of the comic but without the alternate-drawn ending. You will receive a link to download this perk as soon as the book is finished, approx late March of 2014.

Notre-Dame des Hirondelles : livre électronique (ebook)

Vous pouvez obtenir le roman graphique à une version numérique (pourtant sans la scène finale alternative). Dès que la publication sera accomplie vous recevrez un lien (link) afin de télécharger le livre ; à peu près à la fin du mois de mars 2014.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WALLPAPERS

5 desktop wallpapers to choose from will be available for download.

Fond d'écran

5 fonds d'écran pour choisir celui qui ornera votre écran d' ordinateur ou d'Iphone------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BOOKMARKS

10 beautifully designed printed bookmarks.

Marque-page

10 dessins magnifiques des marque-pages.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ART PRINTS

10 limited edition, signed and numbered, high quality art prints to choose from, depicting scenes from the graphic novel. Printed in 300gr quality paper, (33x48 cm).

Reproductions

10 reproductions signées dont le nombre est limité. Ces reproductions dépeignent des scènes prises du roman graphique. Les dimensions de ces reproductions sont 33x48 cm sur papier de 300gr.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

POSTCARD BOX

A box set of 10 postcards (17,5 x 12,5cm), depicting scenes from the graphic novel.

Boîte de cartes

Une boîte de 10 cartes postales différentes (dimensions 17,5x12,5cm) dépeignant des scènes prises du roman graphique.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

T-SHIRTS

Organic cotton t-shirts depicting artwork from the graphic novel.Choose one of the three available colors (gray, beige, light blue) and let us know your size.

Des T-shirts

un t-shirt en coton biologique dépeignant une image du roman graphique (choisissez une des couleurs qui existent: ciel, beige, ou gris et informez-nous de votre taille)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ΟUR LADY OF THE SWALLOWS sketchbook

A 16page A4 sized, limited edition, signed sketchbook, with sketches and studies of characters and elements.

Notre-Dame des Hirondelles en format de livre de croquis (sketchbook)

un livret de 16 pages, (dimensions A4 21,0x 29,7cm) signé par le dessinateur, plein d' études de caractères et d' autres éléments du livre, comme aussi des brouillons de croquis.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A MODEST PROPOSAL short story

A PDF file of the 3-page comic, based on the controversial, satirical essay of the same name, by Jonathan Swift. Available in black & white, or full-colored versions, in Greek, English, or French.

Une proposition modeste/ une histoire courte (short story)

Vous pourrez télécharger une archive au format PDF comprenant une BD de 3 pages, basé sur un essai controversé de Johathan Swift. Cette BD existe en couleur, en noir et blanc comme aussi en trois langues : grec, français et anglais.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ART COMMISSION

You have the opportunity of commissioning a sketch from the book's creator. Choose a character depicted on the graphic novel, or send your own photograph in order to have your unique portrait. The sketch (b/w or full colored) can be drawn either on the printed edition, or on a separate A4
(29.5x21 cm) special paper.

Un croquis sous demande

Vous aurez la possibilité de demander au dessinateur du roman graphique de dessiner, spécialement pour vous, un croquis unique, soit en choisissant un personnage du roman graphique pour dépeindre soit en envoyant une photo de vous afin que le créateur fasse votre portrait. Le croquis pourra être sur l'édition elle-même ou sur un papier à part aux dimensions 29,5x21cm. Le type de papier sera spécialisé.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ORIGINAL PAGES

Whether you are a collector or just love the artwork you can choose from a variety of pages from the graphic novel. They're drawn on A3  (27,9x42,0cm) paper. The numbers in the red dots are no longer available. Thank you!

Des pages authentiques

Soit que vous êtes un collecteur soit que vous adorez les œuvres d'art, vous pourrez choisir parmi une variété des pages authentiques du roman graphique, en papier spécialisé et aux dimensions de A3 (27,9x42,0cm). Les nombres encerclés en rouge sont déjà choisis.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ΟUR LADY OF THE SWALLOWS Pack of 5 printed copies
If you are a retailer, a museum or an organization, you can get 5 copies with a 50% discount! If you are located in Athens, Greece we'll deliver them to you. Please add 30 € for shipping in Europe and 40 € for anywhere else in the world.


Notre-Dame des Hirondelles un paquet de 5 copies

Si vous êtes un propriétaire d' un comic shop ou un libraire ; si vous représente un musée ou un lieu de culture, vous pouvez obtenir 5 copies avec une réduction de prix de 50%. Si vous habitez à Athènes la livraison sera faite par nous-mêmes ; sinon, veillez à voir à droite de la page, (colonne verticale des offres) les exta shipping costs (les frais des envois spéciaux). Autrement veillez à inclure 30€ (frais d'envoi) tarif Europe et 40€ si le destinataire de cet envoi réside hors d' Europe.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are not able to financially support the project OUR LADΥ OF THE SWALLOWS, there are many other ways to help us. Add it to your favourites on Indiegogo and leave a comment, use the Indiegogo social sharing tools, or spread the word by posting information on your website or blog.Thank you!

D'autres moyens afin de nous supporter

Si vous n'avez pas la possibilité de supporter financièrement le projet du roman graphique Notre-Dame des Hirondelles, il y a plein d'autres façons de le faire. Vous pouvez nous aider à arriver à notre but. Ajouter notre promotion à vos favorites sur IdieGoGo, en faisant un commentaire ; utilisez en plus, les outils du réseau social de IndieGoGo, ou rependez notre travail en faisant monter les informations sur votre site internet ou sur votre blog. Merci d'avance!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS
The opening video was shot and cut by Panagiotis Gakis and featured the track "440" by Sugar Factory.

Special thanks for the English translations to Eleni Angelou, and for the French to Αnna Bibi, Betty Kavellari and Mary.

Our sincere gratitude to Vasdekis Publications for kindly granting us the translation by Ioanna Hatzinikoli.


Honneur

La vidéo sur la page d'accueil est dirigée et éditée par Panagiotis Gakis. La musique de cette vidéo c'est le chant «440» de Sugar Factory.

Nous remercions du fond de cœur Hélèn Angelou de ses traductions en langue anglaise comme aussi Anna Bibi, Bettie Kavellari et Marie de leurs traductions en langue française. 

Nous remercions les éditions Vasdeki pour la concession de droits de traduction de Ioanna Chatzinikoli.

enfants. «Notre-dame des Hirondelles» est son premier graphic novel ;
mais en parallèle il travaille sur la création d' un jeu de société. Il habite
au centre d'Athènes près des vestiges du passé à la compagnie de deux
escargots. 
Georges Tsiamantas dans son travail de créer ce roman graphique
est encadré par le professeur de lettres Vagelis Psarianos et l'éditeur Ilias
Katirtziyianoglou.Pour des informations supplémentaires sur ce projet et l'équipe derrière
 tout cela, veillez visitez s'il vous plaît notre site web.What We Need & What You GetΔείτε τις πληροφορίες και  τη λίστα των 'ανταλλαγμάτων/perks' στο site μας και επιστρέψτε για να κάνετε την συνεισφορά σας!We need your support to complete the project and proceed with
its publication. Our goal is 2000 €. This amount (after taxes) will cover
the printing cost, artists' fees and shipping. In return for your support
you will receive a choice of perks.
These are the items you can get as a "thank you" for
being part of Our-Lady-of-the-Swallows. Please check the perks sidebar on
the right to see how they are combined and how you can get them.
Please add 5 € for shipping anywhere BUT Greece. For
the Retailers Pack please add 30 € for shipping in Europe and
40 € for anywhere else in the world.
Vous
pouvez devenir vous aussi un partenaire de ce travail
Nous avons besoin de votre aide afin que cette œuvre
s'accomplisse et se publie. Notre but est de ramasser un somme de 2000
euros ; un somme (sans les taxes) qui couvrira les frais de publication,
les frais d 'envoi et le remboursement de l'artiste. À l'échange de votre
soutien, nous vous présentons une variété d'offres pour que vous choisissiez
celle que vous convient. 
Un grand merci pour votre soutien ; vous pouvez choisir
entre autres :(observez, à droite de la page, il y a une colonne verticale
avec les offres, leur combinaison et ce que vous pouvez obtenir) 
S'il vous plaît veillez à inclure les frais d'envoi (5€) partout
dans le monde en exception de la Grèce. Pour les libraires: Autrement veillez à
inclure 30€ (frais d'envoi) tarif Europe et 40€ si le destinataire de cet envoi
réside hors d' Europe. 
ΟUR
LADY OF THE SWALLOWS Graphic novel
The main offer is a high quality edition of the comic. The
120 pages book features the complete story as well as an alternate-drawn
ending. It will be printed in full color and is 23x30 cm in size. The
book will be signed and a character sketch of your choosing (not necessarily
from the story) will be drawn inside. This perk will be shipped as soon as
the book is finished and printed, approx early April 2014.Notre-Dame
des Hirondelles ; le roman graphiqueL'édition : en roman graphique en 120 pages colorés
(23x30cm). À part de l'histoire narrée, le livre présente une scène finale
alternative. Vous pouvez obtenir le roman graphique signé, avec le croquis d'un
personnage de votre choix (ce personnage ne peut pas être obligatoirement un
héros pris de notre livre Notre-Dame des hirondelles, il peut être n'importe
héros / personnage). Finalement votre nom sera présent sur la liste de
ceux que nous remercions! Notre édition vous sera envoyée dès que le roman
graphique sera publié, probablement au début d' avril 2014. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ΟUR
LADY OF THE SWALLOWS eBook
You can have a digital version of the graphic novel. A downloadable PDF
file of the comic but without the alternate-drawn ending. You will receive
a link to download this perk as soon as the book is finished, approx late
March of 2014.
Notre-Dame
des Hirondelles : livre électronique (ebook)
Vous pouvez obtenir le roman graphique à une version numérique
(pourtant sans la scène finale alternative). Dès que la publication sera
accomplie vous recevrez un lien (link) afin de télécharger le livre ; à
peu près à la fin du mois de mars 2014.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WALLPAPERS
5 desktop wallpapers to choose from will be available for
download.
Fond
d'écran
5 fonds d'écran pour choisir celui qui ornera votre écran d'
ordinateur ou d'Iphone------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BOOKMARKS
10 beautifully designed printed bookmarks.
Marque-page
10 dessins magnifiques des marque-pages.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ART
PRINTS
10 limited edition, signed and numbered, high quality art prints
to choose from, depicting scenes from the graphic novel. Printed in 300gr
quality paper, (33x48 cm).
Reproductions
10 reproductions signées dont le nombre est limité. Ces
reproductions dépeignent des scènes prises du roman graphique. Les dimensions
de ces reproductions sont 33x48 cm sur papier de 300gr.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
POSTCARD
BOX
A box set of 10 postcards (17,5 x 12,5cm), depicting scenes
from the graphic novel.
Boîte
de cartes
Une boîte de 10 cartes postales différentes (dimensions
17,5x12,5cm) dépeignant des scènes prises du roman graphique.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

T-SHIRTS
Organic cotton t-shirts depicting artwork from the graphic
novel.Choose one of the three available colors (gray, beige, light blue) and let us know your size.
Des
T-shirts
un t-shirt en coton biologique dépeignant une image du roman graphique (choisissez une des couleurs qui existent: ciel, beige, ou gris et informez-nous de votre taille)------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ΟUR
LADY OF THE SWALLOWS sketchbook
A 16page A4 sized, limited edition, signed sketchbook, with
sketches and studies of characters and elements.
Notre-Dame
des Hirondelles en format de livre de croquis (sketchbook)
un livret de 16 pages, (dimensions A4 21,0x 29,7cm) signé par le
dessinateur, plein d' études de caractères et d' autres éléments du livre,
comme aussi des brouillons de croquis. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A
MODEST PROPOSAL short story
A PDF file of the 3-page comic, based on the controversial,
satirical essay of the same name, by Jonathan Swift. Available in black &
white, or full-colored versions, in Greek, English, or French.
Une
proposition modeste/ une histoire courte (short story)
Vous pourrez télécharger une archive au format PDF comprenant
une BD de 3 pages, basé sur un essai controversé de Johathan Swift. Cette BD
existe en couleur, en noir et blanc comme aussi en trois langues : grec,
français et anglais. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ART
COMMISSION
You have the opportunity of commissioning a sketch from the
book's creator. Choose a character depicted on the graphic novel, or send
your own photograph in order to have your unique portrait. The sketch (b/w
or full colored) can be drawn either on the printed edition, or on a
separate A4
(29.5x21 cm) special paper.
Un
croquis sous demande
Vous aurez la possibilité de demander au dessinateur du roman
graphique de dessiner, spécialement pour vous, un croquis unique, soit en
choisissant un personnage du roman graphique pour dépeindre soit en envoyant
une photo de vous afin que le créateur fasse votre portrait. Le croquis pourra
être sur l'édition elle-même ou sur un papier à part aux dimensions 29,5x21cm.
Le type de papier sera spécialisé. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ORIGINAL
PAGES
Whether you are a collector or just love the artwork you can
choose from a variety of pages from the graphic novel. They're drawn on A3
 (27,9x42,0cm) paper. The numbers in the red dots are no longer available. Thank you!
Des
pages authentiques
Soit que vous êtes un collecteur soit que vous adorez les œuvres
d'art, vous pourrez choisir parmi une variété des pages authentiques du roman
graphique, en papier spécialisé et aux dimensions de A3 (27,9x42,0cm). Les nombres encerclés en rouge sont déjà choisis.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ΟUR
LADY OF THE SWALLOWS Pack of 5 printed copies
If you are a retailer, a museum or an organization, you can get 5
copies with a 50% discount! If you are located in Athens, Greece we'll
deliver them to you. Please add 30 € for shipping in Europe and
40 € for anywhere else in the world.
Notre-Dame
des Hirondelles un paquet de 5 copies
Si vous êtes un propriétaire d' un comic shop ou un libraire ;
si vous représente un musée ou un lieu de culture, vous pouvez obtenir 5 copies
avec une réduction de prix de 50%. Si vous habitez à Athènes la livraison sera
faite par nous-mêmes ; sinon, veillez à voir à droite de la page, (colonne
verticale des offres) les exta shipping costs (les frais des envois spéciaux). Autrement veillez à
inclure 30€ (frais d'envoi) tarif Europe et 40€ si le destinataire de cet envoi
réside hors d' Europe. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OTHER
WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If you are not able to financially support the project OUR LADΥ
OF THE SWALLOWS, there are many other ways to help us. Add it to your
favourites on Indiegogo and leave a comment, use the Indiegogo social
sharing tools, or spread the word by posting information on your website
or blog.Thank you!
D'autres
moyens afin de nous supporter
Si vous
n'avez pas la possibilité de supporter financièrement le projet du roman
graphique Notre-Dame des Hirondelles, il y a plein d'autres façons de le faire.
Vous pouvez nous aider à arriver à notre but. Ajouter notre promotion à vos
favorites sur IdieGoGo, en faisant un commentaire ; utilisez en plus, les
outils du réseau social
de IndieGoGo, ou rependez notre travail en faisant monter les informations sur
votre site internet ou sur votre blog. Merci d'avance!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS
The opening video was shot and cut by Panagiotis Gakis and featured the
track "440" by Sugar Factory.
Special thanks for the English translations to Eleni Angelou, and for the French to Αnna Bibi, Betty Kavellari and Mary.Our sincere gratitude to Vasdekis Publications for kindly granting us the translation by Ioanna Hatzinikoli.
Honneur
La vidéo sur la page d'accueil est dirigée et éditée par Panagiotis Gakis. La
musique de cette vidéo c'est le chant «440» de Sugar Factory.
Nous remercions du fond de cœur Hélèn Angelou de ses traductions
en langue anglaise comme aussi Anna Bibi, Bettie Kavellari et Marie de leurs traductions
en langue française. Nous remercions les éditions Vasdeki pour la concession de droits de traduction de Ioanna Chatzinikoli.

story:
Creator: Mike S. Miller

Projects: MEG, SIXGUN SAMURAI and DEAL WITH THE DEVIL

 

Hello, my name is Mike S. Miller, I'm a 26 year career professional comic book creator. NY Times #1 artist of DC's INJUSTICE series, and George R. R. Martin's A GAME OF THRONES cover artist. I have spent a quarter of a century honing my skills in order to bring you projects that I hope you will love. You can come and get to know me on my youtube channel BLACKLIST UNIVERSE, and become part of my extended family and community of comic book fans!

What I'm offering here to you today firstly is an EXCLUSIVE PREMIER EDITION of Steve Alten's MEG graphic novel adaptation, produced in association with Dabel Brothers Production and Steve Alten, and offered here through IndieGoGo. This version of the book will NEVER BE AVAILABLE IN STORES! So if you are a MEG HEAD, you NEED THIS BOOK!  Once it is gone from IndieGoGo, it will never be made available again! The MEG IndieGoGo exclusive graphic novel will be a minimum of 144 pages, with pages to be added as the campaign hits higher milestones!

The exclusive IndieGoGo cover inks can be seen here:

 

Retail TPB cover art.

An exciting interior page from the graphic novel:

MEG illustrated by Mike S. Miller. Written by Steve Alten, Mike S. Miller and J.S. Earls

WANT MORE MEG PREVIEW? CHECK OUT THE FIRST ISSUE HERE FOR FREE!

In addition to MEG, I'm making available two other graphic novels of my own intellectual properties, SIXGUN SAMURAI and DEAL WITH THE DEVIL!

SIXGUN SAMURAI: Kung Fu’ meets ‘The Karate Kid’ in this classic tale about a boy in search of his father. The teenaged Sixgun Samurai is on his way east to find his father, his last known living relative. But as he travels across the untamed prairie, he finds that dangerous men with dark motives are in pursuit, prepared to kill him to take his swords for reasons they dare not explain.  Sixgun is a minimum of 144 pages.

Sixgun Samurai illustrated by Harold Edge. Written by Mike S. Miller and Sean Jordan

WANT MORE SIXGUN PREVIEW? DOWNLOAD THE FIRST FULL CHAPTER PDF FREE HERE!!!

DEAL WITH THE DEVIL is the story of retired FBI agent Anthony Goodwin who receives an unexpected visit from "the one that got away" – a man known as the "Red Letter Killer" who destroyed agent Goodwin's leg and vanished years before. But things have changed, and Goodwin's worst enemy needs his help to stop a copycat killer who has kidnapped his sister in an attempt to bring the original killer under his control.  DWTD is a minimum of 128 pages.

WANT MORE DWTD PREVIEW? Download the first FULL ISSUE PDF HERE FREE!

Deal with the Devil is illustrated by Sherwin Schwartzrock. Written by Mike S. Miller

SPECIAL NOTICE:

These books are all COMPLETED, and ready to print! And their funding will go toward the development and production of NEW intellectual properties from BLACKLIST UNIVERSE including but not limited to: LONESTAR: SOUL OF THE SOLDIER, THE ATOMIC FAMILY, GODSWORD and more!  Help bring the Blacklist Universe to life, by supporting these projects!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We're only asking for $20K to fund the printing and shipping of these books, as the work has all been completed. So this minimum will get these to you in short order!  No waiting for months on end for a project to be completed, once I have numbers in hand, I can send these books to the printer and get them on their way to you!  
  • Special perks will include signed books, sketch covers, original art, and more! Check out the perks on the right!

Make an Impact! Build the FUTURE!

  • The MEG made a worldwide impact as a blockbuster summer movie, and a sequel already in motion! The novels are NY Times best sellers, and MEG HEADS are devoted fans around the world! This one-time-only offering of this EXCLUSIVE Indiegogo edition of the graphic novel adaptation is a MUST HAVE for any fan of Steve Alten's MEG series!
  • SIXGUN SAMURAI and DEAL WITH THE DEVIL are critically acclaimed series here for the first time packaged as graphic novels. Offered to you DIRECTLY from the creator of the books, Mike S. Miller!
  • Funding these projects will aid in the building of the entire BLACKLIST UNIVERSE of heroes, an endeavor that is destined to challenge Marvel and DC in the decades to come, an you can help build that future!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • If you believe in BLACKLIST UNIVERSE, if you just love THE MEG, then please do whatever you can to spread the good news about what we're doing here today!
  • Indiegogo has 'share' tools for all your social media platforms, please hit those buttons and help bring this project and future projects to life, and help change the future of comics!!!

The MEG made a worldwide impact as a blockbuster summer movie, and a sequel already in motion! The novels are NY Times best sellers, and MEG HEADS are devoted fans around the world! This one-time-only offering of this EXCLUSIVE Indiegogo edition of the graphic novel adaptation is a MUST HAVE for any fan of Steve Alten's MEG series!
SIXGUN SAMURAI and DEAL WITH THE DEVIL are critically acclaimed series here for the first time packaged as graphic novels. Offered to you DIRECTLY from the creator of the books, Mike S. Miller!
Funding these projects will aid in the building of the entire BLACKLIST UNIVERSE of heroes, an endeavor that is destined to challenge Marvel and DC in the decades to come, an you can help build that future!

 
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

If you believe in BLACKLIST UNIVERSE, if you just love THE MEG, then please do whatever you can to spread the good news about what we're doing here today!
Indiegogo has 'share' tools for all your social media platforms, please hit those buttons and help bring this project and future projects to life, and help change the future of comics!!!

story:
Diskordia is a surreal fantasy webcomic that explores themes such as the nature of reality, consciousness and self-determination. It does so with equal doses of hilarity, whimsy and mind numbing horror. 

The main story follows Jackal Black, a cynical and sarcastic young man as he is yanked from his dull life into the bizarre dreamtime; a transit hub between dimensions. He will travel through these strange and varied realms encountering curiously odd creatures and terrifying foes while discovering the true horrific and baffling nature of the world he thought he knew.

Hi, my name is Rivenis, The creator of the online Graphic novel series Diskordia. I've been publishing it online since 2011 and have created almost 700 pages of content  through 17 issues with no signs of stopping or slowing down. You can even read the entire series for free online right now! Link here. Since entering the field of print I've been publishing the books under the header of my company Void King Publishing. 

For the print edition I'm working with Kasra Ghanbari and his publishing company 44FLOOD. They have a ton of experience and both books have been professionally edited by Kasra.
 
I've also received a ton of help from Black Sci fi.com an online website dedicated to seeing high quality works from black creators succeed.
 

What you get with this campaign is Diskordia book 1 and 2. Each book is a deluxe 200 page hardcover measuring at 6.625 x 10.25 inches. Those who get both books will receive the slipcase for free. Also of note is that books purchased through this campaign are discounted from the $30 cover price to only $25.

Each book contains issues from the series re-edited especially for print as well as a full colour illustration gallery and a bonus story exclusive to these print editions. 

 

We've already raised enough money to produce the books. As of the writing Book 1 is already here and book 2 along with the slipcases are currently being printed and will arrive in a few months. However there's always a need for additional funding to cover backend expenses such as import and government fees, fluctuating post office prices, and other hidden and unexpected expenses. This campaign is a good way to offer fans a second chance to help with this endeavour while giving them a great deal.
 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

I mentioned earlier that with this kind of campaign additional expenses will always pop up out of nowhere and that's certainly true. I want to create as much of a buffer as possible through In demand. We're in a very good position because we're already in the manufacturing phase. Thanks to dealing with the port concerning book 1 I already know exactly what kind of fees to expect. The printers I deal with are amazing and the quality of the finished product has to be felt to be believed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to contribute that's perfectly fine. You can help by spreading the word on social media and sharing this campaign wherever you can. That's the backbone upon which success rests!

Miscellaneous pretty pictures

story:
Short Summary

My name is Rachel Dukes. I’m an illustrator/cartoonist and have been and self-publishing comics for a decade. Recently, I've worked with BOOM! Studios and graduated with my MFA from The Center for Cartoon Studies. Primarily, I post comics on my own website and on Tumblr, but I also try and exhibit at as many comic conventions throughout the year as possible. (As they're the thing that really pays my bills and help me make new fans and friends.)

Last week I was contacted by Josh O'Neill from Locust Moon in Philadelphia inviting me to attend the Locust Moon Comics Festival on October 5th. I have zero dollars in my bank account but this years Locust Moon Fest is host to brilliant creators like Jim Steranko, Dean Haspiel, Kim Deitch, and the Meathaus gang; so it's a hard offer to turn down. It's also a great opportunity for me to go over to the east coast and broaden my audience as a mini-comics creator.

What I Need

$900 will cover the entire trip: printing and packing books to bring to the show, mailing backers their books and perks, Indiegogo and Paypal fees, show costs, food, the works. Let's break down those expenses:

  • Purchasing the table at the show, travel to get there, and a few cheesesteaks once I'm there (so that I don't starve) is going to run me $450.
  • Printing 100 copies of each of my latest minis (Adventure Story, Stay With Me, Frankie Comics, and Coldwater) is going to cost $350.
  • Indiegogo and Paypal fees are going cost another $100.

What You Get

Mini-comics and artwork by yours truly, delivered right to your door! (All backer prices include shipping costs.)

I have four mini-comics and two big anthologies I can offer you as perks. Three of the four minis are completed and just need to be printed. I'm finishing the last one up this week. (The two anthologies are printed and sitting on my stock shelf, just waiting for new homes.)

  • Adventure Story: Short, silent comic about a cat and it's teapot. In the style of Ed Emberly. (2.75" x 4.25" // 6 pages.)

  • Stay With Me: Short, silent comic about a cat and a wolf. (3.875" x 5.5" // 6 pages.)

  • Frankie Comics: Collection of gag strips chronically the adventures of Frankie the cat. (5.25" x 7.75" // 14 pages.)

  • Coldwater: A short story about two young punks musing about the future. (5.25" x 7.75" // 14 pages.)

  • Side A: Over 30 short stories in this music-inspired anthology. About the influence that music has on the creative process and the life of the artist, the book includes stories illustrated by comic veterans Liz Greenfield, Corey Marie Parkhill, and Ben Snakepit. (6.625" × 10.25" // 136 pages.)

  • Side B: Created by veteran and ingenue artists alike, Side B contains over 200 pages of lost lovers, rocking out, spirit guides, ghosts, and dinosaurs – it’s like an action adventure comic for the music lover in all of us.

    Including the creative talents of such comic icons as Jeffrey Brown (Clumsy), Brandon Graham (Multiple Warheads), Ryan Kelly (Local), Jim Mahfood (Clerks), Box Brown, Colleen Frakes, Cristy C. Road, Grant Reynolds, Joe Decie, John Isaacson, Jonathan Baylis, Liz Baillie, Noah Van Sciver, and many more!

    Whether you’re an audiophile or a comic nerd, this unique and electrifying read will show you how music touches our lives every day as an influential and defining part of every generation, every culture. (6.625" × 10.25" // 232 pages.)

  • Commissioned Artwork: I'm also offering five black and white, 11"x17" custom commissions at half off for $100/pop. You and your sweetheart, your pets, their sweethearts, gift for a buddy... whatever.

If We Don't Reach $900

Then my heart will be broken.

Just kidding! But really: if we don't hit $900 it's not the end of the world. I'll still print and mail people copies of their comics, even if I can't make it to the show myself. Alternate options include:

  • Getting to the show in person but printing less than 100 copies of each of the mini-comics.
  • Renting the tablespace at the show, sending my books along without me, and having friends sell on my behalf. (But: boring for my poor friends, amirite?)
  • ...some third thing.

The Impact

As a creator on the west coast, it's incredibly difficult for me to travel out in person to meet readers and shop owners to expand my readership on and to the east coast. (Obviously, as you can see from the $900 goal set, it's an expensive task and not something I can do regularly.)

While I have an online store, it's always easier to make new fans and sell my work in person. Conventions are what bring me new readers and what pay my bills.

By pledging to this campaign you're not simply helping me get to the Locust Moon Comics Fest, you're helping me spread the word about my work as a cartoonist and helping other comic enthusiasts find my work in the easiest way possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word! Tweet, Tumbl, and reblog about this campaign.
    Use those Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all she wrote.
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Rachel Dukes. I’m an illustrator/cartoonist and have been and self-publishing comics for a decade. Recently, I've worked with BOOM! Studios and graduated with my MFA from The Center for Cartoon Studies. Primarily, I post comics on my own website and on Tumblr, but I also try and exhibit at as many comic conventions throughout the year as possible. (As they're the thing that really pays my bills and help me make new fans and friends.)Last week I was contacted by Josh O'Neill from Locust Moon in Philadelphia inviting me to attend the Locust Moon Comics Festival on October 5th. I have zero dollars in my bank account but this years Locust Moon Fest is host to brilliant creators like Jim Steranko, Dean Haspiel, Kim Deitch, and the Meathaus gang; so it's a hard offer to turn down. It's also a great opportunity for me to go over to the east coast and broaden my audience as a mini-comics creator.


What I Need

$900 will cover the entire trip: printing and packing books to bring to the show, mailing backers their books and perks, Indiegogo and Paypal fees, show costs, food, the works. Let's break down those expenses:

Purchasing the table at the show, travel to get there, and a few cheesesteaks once I'm there (so that I don't starve) is going to run me $450.

Printing 100 copies of each of my latest minis (Adventure Story, Stay With Me, Frankie Comics, and Coldwater) is going to cost $350.
Indiegogo and Paypal fees are going cost another $100.

What You GetMini-comics and artwork by yours truly, delivered right to your door! (All backer prices include shipping costs.)I have four mini-comics and two big anthologies I can offer you as perks. Three of the four minis are completed and just need to be printed. I'm finishing the last one up this week. (The two anthologies are printed and sitting on my stock shelf, just waiting for new homes.) 

Adventure Story: Short, silent comic about a cat and it's teapot. In the style of Ed Emberly. (2.75" x 4.25" // 6 pages.)


Stay With Me: Short, silent comic about a cat and a wolf. (3.875" x 5.5" // 6 pages.)


Frankie Comics: Collection of gag strips chronically the adventures of Frankie the cat. (5.25" x 7.75" // 14 pages.)


Coldwater: A short story about two young punks musing about the future. (5.25" x 7.75" // 14 pages.)


Side A: Over 30 short stories in this music-inspired anthology. About the influence that music has on the creative process and the life of the artist, the book includes stories illustrated by comic veterans Liz Greenfield, Corey Marie Parkhill, and Ben Snakepit. (6.625" × 10.25" // 136 pages.)


Side B: Created by veteran and ingenue artists alike, Side B contains over 200 pages of lost lovers, rocking out, spirit guides, ghosts, and dinosaurs – it’s like an action adventure comic for the music lover in all of us.Including the creative talents of such comic icons as Jeffrey Brown (Clumsy), Brandon Graham (Multiple Warheads), Ryan Kelly (Local), Jim Mahfood (Clerks), Box Brown, Colleen Frakes, Cristy C. Road, Grant Reynolds, Joe Decie, John Isaacson, Jonathan Baylis, Liz Baillie, Noah Van Sciver, and many more!Whether you’re an audiophile or a comic nerd, this unique and electrifying read will show you how music touches our lives every day as an influential and defining part of every generation, every culture. (6.625" × 10.25" // 232 pages.)


Commissioned Artwork: I'm also offering five black and white, 11"x17" custom commissions at half off for $100/pop. You and your sweetheart, your pets, their sweethearts, gift for a buddy... whatever.



If We Don't Reach $900
Then my heart will be broken.Just kidding! But really: if we don't hit $900 it's not the end of the world. I'll still print and mail people copies of their comics, even if I can't make it to the show myself. Alternate options include:

Getting to the show in person but printing less than 100 copies of each of the mini-comics.

 Renting the tablespace at the show, sending my books along without me, and having friends sell on my behalf. (But: boring for my poor friends, amirite?)
...some third thing.



The Impact
As a creator on the west coast, it's incredibly difficult for me to travel out in person to meet readers and shop owners to expand my readership on and to the east coast. (Obviously, as you can see from the $900 goal set, it's an expensive task and not something I can do regularly.)While I have an online store, it's always easier to make new fans and sell my work in person. Conventions are what bring me new readers and what pay my bills.By pledging to this campaign you're not simply helping me get to the Locust Moon Comics Fest, you're helping me spread the word about my work as a cartoonist and helping other comic enthusiasts find my work in the easiest way possible.


Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word! Tweet, Tumbl, and reblog about this campaign.Use those Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all she wrote.

story:
Port City Pop Con is striving to be the largest convention in Wilmington, NC.

We are looking to bring the biggest celebrities in the pop culture genre to the fans!

 

 

 

If you would like the Sponsorship Kit in a PDF format, please email portcitypopcon@gmail.com

 

What We Need & What You Get

Funds will be used to cover over head of the convention.

In return we are offering unique and powerful advertising opportunities while being a part of what can be a great event for an entire community!

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Community Outreach
  • Unique and fun opportunities
  • Large amounts of people in one location creating the perfect networking and advertising solutions

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Help us spread the word!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
AN UPDATE:

WOW! I’ve gone over my campaign and people are still contributing. I have to say, I couldn’t be any more touched. My plane ticket’s been paid for and I now have enough to print my comics.

I’ve decided I’m going to do a strip-format with a color cover. I’m going to do the fattest mini I’ve done yet, at 24 pages. I’ve got most of the strips thumbed out and semi-planned. I’m gonna be marathonning their completion after some work I’m doing right now wraps.

I look forward to giving all of you at TCAF a mini and some HUGE HUGS!!

To everyone who has helped me… THANK YOU. I can’t express my complete gratitude that you could make this possible for me. I look so forward to mailing you comics and painting for you! If you’ve claimed a perk, think about what you’d like me to draw or paint for you because you’ve got something coming to you after TCAF is done, boy howdy!!

All my love,
Geneva

 

ORIGINAL TEXT:


I LOVE MINICOMICS! I love going to conventions and giving them away, like a fiscally unsound Johnny Appleseed of comics. This year I moved to San Francisco from Ohio, so now I'm super far away from all my wonderful Midwest and East Coast friends. If you help me get to TCAF, I will come with an armload of minicomics to give away for free!

If you donate enough, I will do something fun and adorable for you!!!

If you donate nothing but I make my goal, you can still get a free mini at TCAF! HOW COOL IS THAT? A perk for literally nothing!! Just come up to me and say HI and you will get one.

 

Check me out at http://cartoonfuntime.tumblr.com !!!

this was my friend Emily Partridge's idea, here's her!! she's so cool: http://mountpleasantcomics.tumblr.com/ Consider contributing to HER campaign, too!! 

 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH! 

 

NOTE: 

I chose $700 to cover the cost of airfare (shaping up to be about $650-- which would be about what I'd get after IGG took its cut). If I go over, you'll be helping to pay for things that would have come out of my pocket, such as my time making the comics, and money printing the thing! Also food and my contribution to a hotel room! Thank you very very much!

 

NEW NOTE: WOW I DID NOT EXPECT... THIS TO WORK AT ALL NEVERTHELESS SO FAST.  The indie comics community has been the most welcoming, amazing thing I've ever been so thrilled to be a part of!!! I LOVE YOU VERY VERY MUCH! THANK YOU!!!

story:
A NEW FRONTIER

The All Knightz are back again and this time we have a lot more to offer everyone who takes part in this new crowd fund for three different comics in one campaign.

Hard Wired Revolution, Red Tempo and Night Soul are the projects we trying to fund and this campaign is to help fund the printing, distribution and some of the art of these three All Knightz titles which we have been working on previously.

  • In our last campaign we offered you Comics and artwork for the project known as Hard Wired, but this time we are offering perks for three different projects so you can tailor your pledge for which ever project you prefer.

 

Hard Wired issue 4 pages.

What We Need & What You Receive in Return


  • For each project we are aiming to raise £1500 which will be going towards printing and distributing costs.
  • We already have Hard Wired issues 1, 2 and 3 completed but we have almost finished issue 4 with our own efforts which means we can offer many of you even more perks and even put your contributions towards doing issue 5 which is already being worked on.
  • The same is true of Red Tempo, we are now completing issue 3 so we can use any extra funds to go towards printing issue 4 as well.
  • Last but not least we have Night Soul and we are half way through completing issue 2, we aim to complete this comic by December but we can use anything extra that we make to go towards issue 3 which will be coming in the new year.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Our last crowd fund was a success, it was a bit of a rocky journey at the beginning as many people changed addresses and we was very passionate about making sure everyone received their perks. For us it's not just about the money it's about allowing you to have all of our comics in your hands so you can binge read on our stories.  We want you to know the names of our characters, their backgrounds and all the other details that true fans remember.
  • As always we make ourselves as approachable as possible and many of our supporters have met us in person at various events or Greenwich Market which will attend every Tuesday and Wednesday and now we also attend Camden Market on Saturday's alongside New Motive.

Red Tempo issue 2 page.

Risks & Challenges

The only challenge we had last time was getting all of the perks to all of the people who pledged.  Part of this was because some people gave a contribution but ticked the option to not receive a perk by mistake but this time we will be chasing up every single person who participates to confirm if they want a perk or not.

We will also be a lot more speedy on the perks we send out and we will be giving a schedule on the comics we are sending to you.  What we know for certain is that the following projects will all be available and sent to you before Christmas.

Hard Wired Revolution issues 1,2,3 and 4

Red Tempo issues 1,2 and 3

Night Soul issues 1 and 2.

Additional issues which are after the ones listed above will not be available until after the Christmas break.

Night Soul issue 1 page.

Other Ways You Can Help

More than anything we want to make sure we get the word out about our projects, we have grown dramatically over the last year and have even more stories to come so please even if you can not fund the project share this with your friends, let people know which project you like the most out of Hard Wired, Red Tempo or Night Soul. Follow us on instagram, twitter, facebook, pinterest and visit us online at www.allknightz.com

story:
Can you be a Brit? Whether you are or not, come measure whether you qualify, and have a laugh while you are at it. my comedy immigration show Daphna Baram Something to Declare suffered a financial setback because of this debacle. Help me make sure it gets to the Fringe and make its presence known. I will use all the money to advertise the show and make sure people are aware of its new venue and time. I have worked so hard with my director Amanda Baker to make this show happen. I'm so proud of it and I want as many people as possible, immigrants and indiginous, to enjoy it. 

 The answer to Life In The UK Question of the day 6: In the 2001 general election, how much percentage of first-time voters actually cast their vote? - 20% (I think the Home Office is trying to tell us it wasn't the kids's fault). 

The answer to Life In The UK Question of the day 5: Members in the Welsh Assembly can speak English and Welsh, and all publications of the Assembly are in both languages, True or False? True. (yep, you treat the Welsh nicely hopefully we’ll get to keep them not like those ungrateful Scots...)

The answer to Life In The UK Question of the day 4: Winston Churchill lost the General Election in 1945 - True or False. True, of course. (Nobody gets to stay their welcome. It is frowned upon. Even if he saved you from the Nazis. Horses for courses). 

The answer to Life In The UK Question of the day 3: There are 9 National Parks in the UK - True or False? is False. There are 15? Can you name them? (honestly, don't. Please.)

The answer for Life in the UK Question of the day  2 -  You must treat everyone equally, regardless of sex, race, age, religion, disability, class or sexual orientation - TRUE OR FALSE?

Honestly, it is a real question from the test. the answer is "true", doh!? (And if you don't know that you should be driven straight to Heathrow by Jeremy Clarckson with Katie Hopkins and Prince Philip as your entourage).


The answer for Life in the UK Question of the day  1. Easter eggs often given as presents at Easter as a symbol of new life - True or False? is "true" (if you look at the data on diabetes among kids in the UK, it is a symbol of a new life of insulin dependency, but hey).

story:
Hello, and thanks for checking out my fundraiser for Issue #2 of TIME AND AGAIN!

BACKSTORY: A little while ago I wrote a comic which featured the adventures of a college girl called Cindi who finds a genie in a gem. It was published on another website for a while, and then I continued the story on my own by funding Issue #1 of TIME AND AGAIN. Now it's time for the next issue!

To recap, after finding the genie Cindi tried to wish herself a chest more impressive than what two girls who were harassing her had, but the genie - as genies are apt to - screwed around with Cindi’s wishes. When all was said and done Cindi’s rivals - Tina and Andrea - ended up in love with her and got wishes of their own. Thanks to some poorly worded sentences Cindi, the girls, and a third woman ended up as genies themselves. Now Tina and Andrea have made their way to a frat party, while Cindi and Genie have arrived at Cindi's apartment. Cindi is no longer a genie, but she's not exactly back to normal yet...

The new issue picks the up the next morning, with each character dealing with the consequences of their respective journeys.

This issue deals mainly with plot developments over wishes, but don't worry - there are still transformations to be found! All the same zany and mature sexiness that made the original comic so great is here.

Because this comic and its bonuses include nudity and adult situations, no donors under 18!

I'll be working with the same artists who did last year's TIME AND AGAIN #1, Andrea + Ale! They drew for me the image above and did a great job stepping in and taking over illustration duties.

I'm planning on at least 20 pages, and am looking to raise $2,100 (fees take a lot out). Something that can only be done thanks to fundraising is that for every extra $110 dollars we make over $2,100 I will work in an extra page. So, we make $2,210 the comic is at least 21 pages. $2,320 and it’s 22, and so on.

This is a flexible funding campaign. If we do not reach $2,100 production of the comic will move forward, but at a slower rate than expected.

Please check out the rest of the material on this page to see what other kind of fun bonuses there are, and please donate! I’d love to keep writing this series for all you fans and I hope we can make this happen!

Regards,

Dan Standing
